original: sbyin pas phan 'dogs so; ;la la la ni /
analyzed: sbyin pas phan 'dogs so; ;la la la ni /
translated: I benefit some by generosity,

original: tshul khrims kyis phan 'dogs so //🔽la la'i don du ni /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyis phan 'dogs so // la la'i don du ni /
translated: I benefit some by morality,🔽for the sake of some I give away

original: yan lag dang nying lag yongs su gtong ngo //🔽la la'i don du ni /🔽bu dang chung ma yongs su gtong ngo //
analyzed: yan lag dang nying lag yongs su gtong ngo // la la'i don du ni / bu dang chung ma yongs su gtong ngo //
translated: my major and minor limbs,🔽for the sake of some I give away

original: la la'i don du ni /
analyzed: la la'i don du ni /
translated: my sons and wife,🔽for the sake of some I give away

original: rgyal srid yongs su gtong ngo //🔽la la'i don du ni /
analyzed: rgyal srid yongs su gtong ngo // la la'i don du ni /
translated: my kingdom,🔽for the sake of some I give away

original: bdag yongs su gtong ste /
analyzed: bdag yongs su gtong ste /
translated: myself.

original: de ltar thabs gang dang gang gis sems can rnams kyi don du 'gyur ba'i thabs de dang des sems can rnams kyi don byed do //
analyzed: de ltar thabs gang dang gang gis sems can rnams kyi don du 'gyur ba'i thabs de dang des sems can rnams kyi don byed do //
translated: In this way, I benefit sentient beings by whatever means, by whatever method, for the sake of sentient beings.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na /
translated: Subhūti, in this way

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang / byed pa med pa dang / dmigs su med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la sems kyi brtson 'grus @439b dang ldan pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang / byed pa med pa dang / dmigs su med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la sems kyi brtson 'grus @439b dang ldan pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: When bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom, they complete the perfection of perseverance by means of mental perseverance with regard to all phenomena, which are signless, not acting, not apprehended, not arising, and not occasioning anything.

original: rab 'byor / ji ltar na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / ji ltar na /
translated: Subhūti, how is it that

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang / byed pa med pa dang / dmigs su med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang / byed pa med pa dang / dmigs su med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin zhe na /
translated: when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom, they complete the perfection of concentration with regard to all phenomena, which are signless, not acting, not apprehended, not arising, and not occasioning anything?

original: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang / byed pa med pa dang / dmigs su med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang /🔽mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ma gtogs par ting nge 'dzin gzhan thams
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang / byed pa med pa dang / dmigs su med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ma gtogs par ting nge 'dzin gzhan thams
translated: without activity, unapprehendable, without origin,🔽and without production.

original: cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do /
analyzed: cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do /
translated: From the time they first give rise to the mind of awakening, they abide in the perfection of meditative stabilization with a mind free from signs, and they complete all meditative stabilizations other than the meditative stabilization of the tathāgatas.

original: de 'dod pas dben /
analyzed: de 'dod pas dben /
translated: They are free from desire.

original: sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa /🔽rtog pa dang bcas pa /
analyzed: sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa / rtog pa dang bcas pa /
translated: They are free from evil and nonvirtuous things.🔽They have applied thought.

original: dpyod pa dang bcas pa /
analyzed: dpyod pa dang bcas pa /
translated: They have sustained thought.

original: dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: They attain and abide in the first concentration that possesses both applied and sustained thought and is born of seclusion and is accompanied by joy and pleasure.

original: de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste /
analyzed: de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste /
translated: he becomes inwardly clear and pure.

original: sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas /🔽@440a *// rtog pa med pa /🔽dpyod pa med pa /
analyzed: sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas / @440a *// rtog pa med pa / dpyod pa med pa /
translated: With a mind that is unified,

original: ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: he abides in the second concentration, which is free of conceptualization and analysis, and is accompanied by the joy and pleasure born of meditative stabilization.

original: de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas /
analyzed: de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas /
translated: “Free of desire for joy” means that he is free of the desire that is the root of the five kinds of sensual pleasures.

original: dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms la gnas te /
analyzed: dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms la gnas te /
translated: “Abiding in equanimity” means that he is mindful and aware.🔽“The noble ones declare that he abides in equanimity and is mindful, experiencing pleasure with his body” means that he experiences the pleasure of the third concentration.

original: bde ba lus kyis myong ba la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o //🔽zhes brjod pa ste /
analyzed: bde ba lus kyis myong ba la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o // zhes brjod pa ste /
translated: “Free of desire for joy” means that he is free of the desire that is the root of the five kinds of sensual pleasures.🔽“Abiding in equanimity” means that he is mindful and aware.

original: dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: “The noble ones declare that he abides in equanimity and is mindful, experiencing pleasure with his body” means that he experiences the pleasure of the third concentration.

original: de bde ba'ang spangs /
analyzed: de bde ba'ang spangs /
translated: “Free of desire for joy” means that he is free of the desire that is the root of the five kinds of sensual pleasures.

original: sdug bsngal ba'ang spangs shing /
analyzed: sdug bsngal ba'ang spangs shing /
translated: “Abiding in equanimity” means that he is mindful and aware.🔽“The noble ones declare that he abides in equanimity and is mindful, experiencing pleasure with his body” means that he experiences the pleasure of the third concentration.

original: yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas /
analyzed: yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas /
translated: “Free of desire for joy” means that he is free of the desire that is the root of the five kinds of sensual pleasures.🔽“Abiding in equanimity” means that he is mindful and aware.🔽“The noble ones declare that he abides in equanimity and is mindful, experiencing pleasure with his body” means that he experiences the pleasure of the third concentration.

original: bde ba'ang med /
analyzed: bde ba'ang med /
translated: There is no happiness.🔽

original: sdug bsngal ba'ang med pa /
analyzed: sdug bsngal ba'ang med pa /
translated: It is neither happy nor unhappy.🔽It is pure mindfulness and equanimity.

original: btang snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //🔽de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems dang / snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems dang / dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems dang / btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems kyis 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa /
analyzed: btang snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so // de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems dang / snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems dang / dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems dang / btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems kyis 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa /
translated: He accomplishes and abides in the fourth concentration.

original: nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa thams cad rnam pa thams cad du rgyas par bkang zhing nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa thams cad rnam pa thams cad du rgyas par bkang zhing nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: With a mind endowed with love, a mind endowed with compassion, a mind endowed with joy, and a mind endowed with equanimity, he fills and accomplishes all the world, up to the ends of space, in all its aspects.

original: de nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: de nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: He accomplishes and abides in the sphere of infinite space.

original: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs @440b te gnas so //
analyzed: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs @440b te gnas so //
translated: He accomplishes and abides in the sphere of infinite consciousness.

original: cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: He accomplishes and abides in the sphere of nothingness.

original: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: He abides in the sphere of neither perception nor non-perception.

original: ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnas shing rnam par thar pa brgyad la lugs dang mthun pa dang lugs dang mi mthun par snyoms par 'jug cing rnam par ldang ngo //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnas shing rnam par thar pa brgyad la lugs dang mthun pa dang lugs dang mi mthun par snyoms par 'jug cing rnam par ldang ngo //
translated: Abiding in this perfection of concentration, he enters and emerges from the eight liberations in forward and reverse order.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mnyam par bzhag ste gnas so //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mnyam par bzhag ste gnas so //
translated: He enters and abides in the nine serial absorptions.

original: stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: He abides in the meditative absorption of emptiness.

original: mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //🔽smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so // smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: He abides in the meditative absorption of signlessness.🔽He abides in the meditative absorption of wishlessness.

original: bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: He abides in the uninterrupted meditative absorption.

original: glog lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: glog lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: He abides in the lightning-like meditative absorption.

original: yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: He abides in the perfection of meditative stabilization.

original: rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: He abides in the vajra-like meditative stabilization.

original: de ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas nas lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi khongs su ting nge 'dzin thams cad chud par byas shing dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa
analyzed: de ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas nas lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi khongs su ting nge 'dzin thams cad chud par byas shing dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa
translated: Abiding in this perfection of meditative stabilization, he includes all meditative stabilizations within the knowledge of the aspects of the path through the knowledge of the aspects of the path.🔽He passes beyond the stage of bright vision.

original: las 'da'o // dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa las 'das nas rigs kyi sa las 'da'o //
analyzed: las 'da'o // dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa las 'das nas rigs kyi sa las 'da'o //
translated: Having passed beyond the stage of bright vision, he passes beyond the stage of lineage.

original: rigs kyi sa las 'das nas brgyad pa'i sa las 'da'o //
analyzed: rigs kyi sa las 'das nas brgyad pa'i sa las 'da'o //
translated: Having passed beyond the stage of lineage, he passes beyond the eighth stage.

original: brgyad pa'i sa las 'das nas mthong ba'i sa las @441a *//
analyzed: brgyad pa'i sa las 'das nas mthong ba'i sa las @441a *//
translated: Having passed beyond the eighth stage, he passes beyond the stage of vision.

original: 'da'o; ;mthong ba'i sa las 'das nas bsrabs pa'i sa las 'da'o //
analyzed: 'da'o; ;mthong ba'i sa las 'das nas bsrabs pa'i sa las 'da'o //
translated: Having passed beyond the stage of vision, he passes beyond the stage of thinning.

original: bsrabs pa'i sa las 'das nas 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa las 'da'o //
analyzed: bsrabs pa'i sa las 'das nas 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa las 'da'o //
translated: Having passed beyond the stage of thinning, he passes beyond the stage of separation from passion.

original: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa las 'das nas byas pa rtogs pa'i sa las 'da'o //
analyzed: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa las 'das nas byas pa rtogs pa'i sa las 'da'o //
translated: Having transcended the stage of freedom from passion, he transcends the stage of understanding what is to be done.

original: byas pa rtogs pa'i sa las 'das nas rang sangs rgyas kyis las 'da'o //🔽rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug go /
analyzed: byas pa rtogs pa'i sa las 'das nas rang sangs rgyas kyis las 'da'o // rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug go /
translated: Having transcended the stage of understanding what is to be done, he transcends the stage of the pratyekabuddha.🔽Having transcended the stage of the pratyekabuddha, he enters into the bodhisattva’s faultless stage.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs nas sangs rgyas kyi sa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs nas sangs rgyas kyi sa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: Having entered into the bodhisattva’s faultless stage, he perfects the buddha stage.

original: des de dag la spyod cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes ma thob kyi bar du 'bras bu bar ma dor thob par mi byed do //
analyzed: des de dag la spyod cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes ma thob kyi bar du 'bras bu bar ma dor thob par mi byed do //
translated: Practicing those, he does not take up the intermediate fruition until he has attained the knowledge of a knower of all aspects.

original: de ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas shing mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: de ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas shing mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: “Abiding in this perfection of meditative stabilization, he perfects the superknowledges.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byas nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byed cing /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byas nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byed cing /
translated: Having perfected the superknowledges, he attends on the lord buddhas.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste /
translated: He goes from buddhafield to buddhafield.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsnyen bkur byed do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsnyen bkur byed do //
translated: He serves the blessed buddhas.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la'ang dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'gyur ba dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par byed de //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la'ang dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'gyur ba dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par byed de //
translated: And he plants wholesome roots in the presence of those blessed buddhas, by which wholesome roots the buddhafields are purified and living beings are brought to maturity.

original: 'jig @441b rten gyi khams nas 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro zhing de la sems can rnams kyi don byed do //🔽de la sems can la la ni /🔽sbyin pas yongs su sdud do //
analyzed: 'jig @441b rten gyi khams nas 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro zhing de la sems can rnams kyi don byed do // de la sems can la la ni / sbyin pas yongs su sdud do //
translated: He goes from world system to world system, and he works for the welfare of living beings there.

original: la la ni /
analyzed: la la ni /
translated: There he gathers some living beings through generosity.

original: tshul khrims kyis yongs su sdud do //🔽la la ni /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyis yongs su sdud do // la la ni /
translated: He gathers some through morality.

original: ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs su sdud do //🔽la la ni /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs su sdud do // la la ni /
translated: He gathers some through meditation.

original: shes rab kyis yongs su sdud do //🔽la la ni /🔽rnam pa grol bas yongs su sdud do //
analyzed: shes rab kyis yongs su sdud do // la la ni / rnam pa grol bas yongs su sdud do //
translated: He gathers some through wisdom.

original: la la ni /
analyzed: la la ni /
translated: He gathers some through liberation.🔽He gathers some through the knowledge and insight of liberation.

original: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas yongs su sdud do //🔽la la ni /
analyzed: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas yongs su sdud do // la la ni /
translated: and the knowledge and insight of liberation.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu gzhog go /🔽la la ni /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu gzhog go / la la ni /
translated: Some he establishes in the fruit of entering the stream,

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu gzhog go /🔽la la ni /🔽phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu gzhog go /🔽la la ni /
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu gzhog go / la la ni / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu gzhog go / la la ni /
translated: some in the fruit of being tied to one more rebirth,🔽some in the fruit of no longer being subject to rebirth,

original: dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu gzhog go /🔽la la ni /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu gzhog go / la la ni /
translated: some in the fruit of arhatship,

original: rang byang chub la rab tu gzhog go ;la la ni /
analyzed: rang byang chub la rab tu gzhog go ;la la ni /
translated: some in individual enlightenment,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu gzhog go /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu gzhog go /
translated: and some in supreme perfect enlightenment.

original: de de ltar dge ba'i chos gang dang gang gis sems can rnams mthong bar 'gyur ba de dang de la spyor te /
analyzed: de de ltar dge ba'i chos gang dang gang gis sems can rnams mthong bar 'gyur ba de dang de la spyor te /
translated: In whatever wholesome states he sees beings, in those he establishes them.

original: de ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas shing gzungs kyi sgo thams cad mngon par sgrub bo //
analyzed: de ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas shing gzungs kyi sgo thams cad mngon par sgrub bo //
translated: Abiding in this perfection of meditative stabilization, he accomplishes all the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi rab tu 'thob bo; ;rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa rnams kyang thob pa yin te /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi rab tu 'thob bo; ;rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa rnams kyang thob pa yin te /
translated: He attains the four right discriminations and the superknowledges that arise from evolution.

original: de nam yang las dang nyon mongs pa'i dbang gis ma'i mngal du skye bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nam yang las dang nyon mongs pa'i dbang gis ma'i mngal du skye bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He never again enters the womb of a mother.

original: @442a *// nam yang 'dod pa la sten par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: @442a *// nam yang 'dod pa la sten par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He never again resorts to desire.

original: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i don du skye ba yongs su mi 'dzin pa'ang gang yang med de //
analyzed: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i don du skye ba yongs su mi 'dzin pa'ang gang yang med de //
translated: There is nothing that he does not take up in order to develop living beings.

original: skye ba'i nyes pas kyang gos par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: skye ba'i nyes pas kyang gos par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He is not defiled by the faults of birth.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: de ni / 'di ltar des sgyu ma lta bu'i chos thams cad rab tu mthong /
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar des sgyu ma lta bu'i chos thams cad rab tu mthong /
translated: Because he sees all things as like a magical creation,

original: rab tu rig /
analyzed: rab tu rig /
translated: he knows them,

original: rab tu rtogs pas na /
analyzed: rab tu rtogs pas na /
translated: and he penetrates them.

original: de sgyu ma lta bu'i 'du byed thams cad rig par byas shing sems can thams cad kyi don byed do //
analyzed: de sgyu ma lta bu'i 'du byed thams cad rig par byas shing sems can thams cad kyi don byed do //
translated: Having understood all things as like a magical creation, he works for the welfare of all living beings.

original: des sgyu ma lta bu'i 'du byed thams cad rab tu rig pas sems can rnams la snying rje chen po skyes te /
analyzed: des sgyu ma lta bu'i 'du byed thams cad rab tu rig pas sems can rnams la snying rje chen po skyes te /
translated: “They know that all compounded things are like illusions and so they give rise to great compassion for sentient beings.

original: kye ma sems can 'di dag ni /
analyzed: kye ma sems can 'di dag ni /
translated: ‘Alas, these sentient beings,

original: chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu la 'khor ba na sdug bsngal mang po nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba yin na /
analyzed: chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu la 'khor ba na sdug bsngal mang po nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba yin na /
translated: who experience so much suffering in saṃsāra, which is like an illusion,🔽when will I be able to establish them in nirvāṇa, where all suffering is completely pacified?’

original: bdag gis 'di dag nam zhig na sdug bsngal thams cad nye bar zhi ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la dgod par 'gyur zhes snying rje chen po skyes te /🔽de la'ang sems can nam /
analyzed: bdag gis 'di dag nam zhig na sdug bsngal thams cad nye bar zhi ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la dgod par 'gyur zhes snying rje chen po skyes te / de la'ang sems can nam /
translated: In this way, they give rise to great compassion.

original: sems can du gdags pa dmigs su med de /
analyzed: sems can du gdags pa dmigs su med de /
translated: However, they do not observe any sentient beings or anything that can be designated as a sentient being.

original: des chos thams cad ma dmigs nas 'jig rten gyi tha snyad nye bar bzung ste dmigs su med pa de nyid la sems can rnams rab tu 'god de /
analyzed: des chos thams cad ma dmigs nas 'jig rten gyi tha snyad nye bar bzung ste dmigs su med pa de nyid la sems can rnams rab tu 'god de /
translated: Not observing any phenomena, they establish sentient beings in the absence of observation, using worldly conventions.

original: don dam par ni; ma yin no //
analyzed: don dam par ni; ma yin no //
translated: However, this is not in terms of the ultimate.’

original: de ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas shing bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams @442b cad la spyod de /
analyzed: de ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas shing bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams @442b cad la spyod de /
translated: Standing in this perfection of meditative stabilization, they practice all the meditative stabilizations, liberations, concentrations, and absorptions.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Until they fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening, they never part from the perfection of meditative stabilization.

original: de ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas shing lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mngon par bsgrubs te /
analyzed: de ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas shing lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mngon par bsgrubs te /
translated: Standing in this perfection of meditative stabilization, they manifest the knowledge of path aspects by means of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de la gnas nas bag chags gyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad rab tu spong ngo //🔽bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad rab tu spangs nas bdag gi don kyang byed /
analyzed: de la gnas nas bag chags gyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad rab tu spong ngo // bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad rab tu spangs nas bdag gi don kyang byed /
translated: Standing in that, they completely abandon all the connections of the latent proclivities.

original: gzhan gyi don kyang byed de /
analyzed: gzhan gyi don kyang byed de /
translated: Having completely abandoned all the connections of the latent proclivities, they do their own work and do the work of others.

original: des bdag dang / gzhan gyi don byas nas lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi rim gro'i gnas su gyur pa yin te /
analyzed: des bdag dang / gzhan gyi don byas nas lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi rim gro'i gnas su gyur pa yin te /
translated: having fulfilled his own purpose and that of others, he becomes the object of worship in the world with its gods, humans, and titans.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na /
translated: Thus, Subhūti,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang / byed pa med pa dang / dmigs su med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang / byed pa med pa dang / dmigs su med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin no //
translated: when the bodhisattva mahāsattva practices the perfection of wisdom, in all dharmas that are signless, inactive, unapprehendable, non-arisen, and unproduced, with a mind free from signs he perfects the perfection of meditative stabilization.

original: rab 'byor / ji ltar na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / ji ltar na /
translated: Subhūti, how is it that

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang / byed pa med pa dang / dmigs su med pa dang / 'byung ba @443a *//
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang / byed pa med pa dang / dmigs su med pa dang / 'byung ba @443a *//
translated: “When bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom, how do they complete the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom with regard to all phenomena, which are signless, not acting, not apprehended, not arising,

original: med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin zhe na /
translated: and not occasioning anything?”

original: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang / byed pa med pa dang / dmigs su med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang /🔽mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis yang dag pa'am /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang / byed pa med pa dang / dmigs su med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang /🔽mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis yang dag pa'am /
translated: “Subhūti, here, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom, from the time when they first give rise to the mind of awakening onward, they take all phenomena, which are signless, not acting, not apprehended, not arising,🔽and not occasioning anything, to be like a dream, like a magical creation, like an echo, like an apparition, like a mirage, and like a magical illusion.

original: yongs su grub pa'i chos gang yang yang dag par rjes su mthong ba med de /🔽des gzugs kyi yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: yongs su grub pa'i chos gang yang yang dag par rjes su mthong ba med de / des gzugs kyi yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: He does not see any dharma at all that is real or established.🔽He does not see the real or the established in form.

original: des gzugs kyi yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas /
analyzed: des gzugs kyi yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas /
translated: Since he does not see the real or the established in form,

original: gzugs kyi skye ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: gzugs kyi skye ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: he does not see the arising of form.

original: des gzugs kyi skye ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas /
analyzed: des gzugs kyi skye ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas /
translated: Since he does not see the arising of form,

original: gzugs kyi skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: gzugs kyi skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: he does not see the gateway of the arising of form.

original: des gzugs kyi skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas /
analyzed: des gzugs kyi skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas /
translated: Since he does not see the gateway of the arising of form,

original: gzugs kyi tshogs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: gzugs kyi tshogs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: he does not see the collection of form.

original: gsob nyid dang / gsog nyid du yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo //
analyzed: gsob nyid dang / gsog nyid du yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo //
translated: He sees it as hollow and void.

original: des tshor ba'i yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes @443b su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: des tshor ba'i yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes @443b su mi mthong ste /
translated: He does not see the real or the established in feeling.

original: des tshor ba'i yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas /
analyzed: des tshor ba'i yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas /
translated: They do not see the real, the perfected, of feeling.

original: tshor ba'i skye ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽des tshor pa'i skye ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas /
analyzed: tshor ba'i skye ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // des tshor pa'i skye ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas /
translated: They do not see the arising of feeling.

original: tshor ba'i skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽des tshor ba'i skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas /
analyzed: tshor ba'i skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // des tshor ba'i skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas /
translated: They do not see the door of arising of feeling.

original: tshor ba'i tshogs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: tshor ba'i tshogs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: They do not see the collection of feeling.

original: gsob nyid dang / gsog nyid du yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo //
analyzed: gsob nyid dang / gsog nyid du yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo //
translated: They see it as empty, as void.

original: des 'du shes kyi yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /🔽des 'du shes kyi yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas /
analyzed: des 'du shes kyi yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste / des 'du shes kyi yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas /
translated: They do not see the real, the perfected, of perception.🔽They do not see the arising of perception.🔽They do not see the door of arising of perception.

original: 'du shes kyi skye ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: 'du shes kyi skye ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see the collection of perception.🔽They see it as empty, as void.

original: des 'du shes kyi skye ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas /
analyzed: des 'du shes kyi skye ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas /
translated: Since they do not see the arising of perception,

original: 'du shes kyi skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: 'du shes kyi skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: they do not see the gateway of the arising of perception.

original: des 'du shes kyi skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas /
analyzed: des 'du shes kyi skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas /
translated: Since they do not see the gateway of the arising of perception,

original: 'du shes kyi tshogs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: 'du shes kyi tshogs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: they do not see the collection of perceptions.

original: gsob nyid dang / gsog nyid du yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo //🔽des 'du byed kyi yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: gsob nyid dang / gsog nyid du yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo // des 'du byed kyi yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: They see it as hollow and false.🔽They do not see the suchness and the establishment of volitional factors.

original: des 'du byed kyi yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas /
analyzed: des 'du byed kyi yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas /
translated: Since they do not see the suchness and the establishment of volitional factors,

original: 'du byed kyi skye ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽@444a *// des 'du byed kyi skye ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong bas /
analyzed: 'du byed kyi skye ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // @444a *// des 'du byed kyi skye ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong bas /
translated: they do not see the arising of volitional factors.🔽Since they do not see the arising of volitional factors,

original: 'du byed kyi skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: 'du byed kyi skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: they do not see the gateway of the arising of volitional factors.

original: des 'du byed kyi skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas /
analyzed: des 'du byed kyi skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas /
translated: Since they do not see the door of origination of volitional formations,

original: 'du byed kyi tshogs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: 'du byed kyi tshogs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: they do not see the collection of volitional formations.

original: gsob nyid dang / gsog nyid du yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo //🔽des rnam par shes pa'i yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: gsob nyid dang / gsog nyid du yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo // des rnam par shes pa'i yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: They see it as hollow and void.🔽They do not see the suchness and the reality of consciousness.

original: des rnam par shes pa'i yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas /
analyzed: des rnam par shes pa'i yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas /
translated: Since they do not see the suchness and the reality of consciousness,

original: rnam par shes pa'i skye ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i skye ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: they do not see the origination of consciousness.

original: des rnam par shes pa'i skye ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas /🔽rnam par shes pa'i skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: des rnam par shes pa'i skye ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas / rnam par shes pa'i skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: Since they do not see the origination of consciousness,🔽they do not see the door of origination of consciousness.

original: des rnam par shes pa'i skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas /
analyzed: des rnam par shes pa'i skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas /
translated: Since they do not see the door of origination of consciousness,

original: rnam par shes pa'i tshogs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i tshogs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: He does not see the collection of consciousnesses.

original: gsob nyid dang / gsog nyid du yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo //🔽des mig gi yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: gsob nyid dang / gsog nyid du yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo // des mig gi yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: He sees them as hollow and void.🔽He does not see the real, the perfect, of the eye.

original: des mig gi yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas /
analyzed: des mig gi yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas /
translated: Since he does not see the real, the perfect, of the eye,

original: mig gi skye ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽des mig gi skye ba yang @444b dag par rjes su ma mthong bas /
analyzed: mig gi skye ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // des mig gi skye ba yang @444b dag par rjes su ma mthong bas /
translated: he does not see the arising of the eye.🔽Since he does not see the arising of the eye,

analyzed: mig gi skye pa'i sgo yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //

translated: Since he does not see the door of the arising of the eye,

analyzed: mig gi tshogs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: he does not see the collection of the eye.

original: gsob nyid dang / gsog nyid du yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo //
analyzed: gsob nyid dang / gsog nyid du yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo //
translated: He sees it as hollow and void.

original: des rna ba'i yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: des rna ba'i yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: They do not see the real, the perfected ear.

original: des rna ba'i yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas /
analyzed: des rna ba'i yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas /
translated: Since they do not see the real, the perfected ear,

analyzed: rna ba'i skye ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // des rna ba'i skye ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas /
translated: they do not see the production of the ear.🔽Since they do not see the production of the ear,

original: rna ba'i skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: rna ba'i skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: they do not see the door of production of the ear.

analyzed: des rna ba'i skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas /
translated: Since they do not see the door of production of the ear,

analyzed: rna ba'i tshogs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: they do not see the collection of the ear.

original: gsob nyid dang / gsog nyid du yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo //🔽des sna'i yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: gsob nyid dang / gsog nyid du yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo // des sna'i yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: They see it as hollow and void.🔽They do not see the real, the perfected nose.

original: des sna'i yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas /
analyzed: des sna'i yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas /
translated: Since they do not see the real, the perfected nose,

original: sna'i skye ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽des sna'i skye ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas /
analyzed: sna'i skye ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // des sna'i skye ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas /
translated: They do not see the arising of the nose.🔽Since they do not see the arising of the nose,

original: sna'i skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽des sna'i skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas /
analyzed: sna'i skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // des sna'i skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas /
translated: they do not see the gateway of the arising of the nose.🔽Since they do not see the gateway of the arising of the nose,

analyzed: sna'i tshogs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: they do not see the collection of the nose.

original: gsob nyid dang / gsog nyid du yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo //🔽des lce'i @445a *//
analyzed: gsob nyid dang / gsog nyid du yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo // des lce'i @445a *//
translated: They see it as hollow and void.🔽They do not see the tongue

original: yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: as real or established.

original: des lce'i yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas; lce'i skye ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: des lce'i yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas; lce'i skye ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: Since they do not see the tongue as real or established, they do not see the arising of the tongue.

original: des lce'i skye ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas /
analyzed: des lce'i skye ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas /
translated: Since they do not see the arising of the tongue,

original: lce'i skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: lce'i skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: they do not see the gateway of the arising of the tongue.

original: des lce'i skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas /
analyzed: des lce'i skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas /
translated: Since they do not see the door of birth of the tongue,

translated: They do not see the arising of the feeling that arises from the condition of contact with the body.🔽They do not see the door of the arising of the feeling that arises from the condition of contact with the body.🔽They do not see the door of the arising of the feeling that arises from the condition of contact with the body.

translated: They do not see the collection of the feeling that arises from the condition of contact with the body.🔽They see it as empty, as having nothing to do with attachment, as having nothing to do with aversion, as having nothing to do with delusion, as having nothing to do with birth, as having nothing to do with aging, as having nothing to do with death, as having nothing to do with suffering, as having nothing to do with origination, as having nothing to do with cessation, and as having nothing to do with path.🔽They see it as having nothing to do with affliction, as having nothing to do with purification, as having nothing to do with abandonment, as having nothing to do with realization, as having nothing to do with meditation, as having nothing to do with knowledge, as having nothing to do with the knowable, as having nothing to do with the conditioned, and as having nothing to do with the unconditioned.

analyzed: gsob nyid dang / gsog nyid du yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo //

translated: They do not see the real, the perfected craving.

analyzed: des sred pa'i yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas /
translated: They do not see the arising of craving.🔽They do not see the door of the arising of craving.🔽They do not see the accumulation of craving.🔽They see it as hollow and void.🔽They do not see the reality or the accomplishment of grasping.🔽They do not see the arising of grasping.🔽They do not see the door of the arising of grasping.

analyzed: sred pa'i skye ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // des sred pa'i skye ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas /
translated: They do not see the accumulation of grasping.🔽They see it as hollow and void.🔽They do not see the reality or the accomplishment of becoming.🔽They do not see the arising of becoming.🔽They do not see the door of the arising of becoming.

original: sred pa'i skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽des sred pa'i skye ba'i sgo yang dag par @455a *//🔽rjes su ma mthong bas /
analyzed: sred pa'i skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // des sred pa'i skye ba'i sgo yang dag par @455a *// rjes su ma mthong bas /
translated: They do not see the accumulation of becoming.🔽They see it as hollow and void.🔽They do not see the reality or the accomplishment of birth.🔽They do not see the arising of birth.🔽They do not see the door of the arising of birth.🔽They do not see the accumulation of birth.🔽They see it as hollow and void.🔽They do not see the reality or the accomplishment of old age and death.🔽They do not see the arising of old age and death.🔽They do not see the door of the arising of old age and death.

original: sred pa'i tshogs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: sred pa'i tshogs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: They do not see the accumulation of old age and death.🔽They see it as hollow and void.🔽They do not see the reality or the accomplishment of suffering.🔽They do not see the arising of suffering.🔽They do not see the door of the arising of suffering.🔽They do not see the accumulation of suffering.

original: gsob nyid dang / gsog nyid du yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo //
analyzed: gsob nyid dang / gsog nyid du yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo //
translated: They see it as hollow and void.🔽They do not see the reality or the accomplishment of the origin of suffering.🔽They do not see the arising of the origin of suffering.🔽They do not see the door of the arising of the origin of suffering.

original: des len pa'i yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /🔽des len pa'i yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas /
analyzed: des len pa'i yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste / des len pa'i yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas /
translated: They do not see the accumulation of the origin of suffering.🔽They see it as hollow and void.🔽They do not see the reality or the accomplishment of the cessation of suffering.🔽They do not see the arising of the cessation of suffering.🔽They do not see the door of the arising of the cessation of suffering.

original: len pa'i skye ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: len pa'i skye ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see the accumulation of the cessation of suffering.🔽They see it as hollow and void.🔽They do not see the reality or the accomplishment of the path.🔽They do not see the arising of the path.🔽They do not see the door of the arising of the path.🔽They do not see the accumulation of the path.

original: des len pa'i skye ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas /🔽len pa'i skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //

analyzed: des dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /

analyzed: des smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas /

analyzed: smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi skye ba @466b yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //

translated: They see it as hollow and void.🔽They do not see the real, nor the fully present thusness of great compassion.🔽Since they do not see the real, nor the fully present thusness of great compassion,

original: snying rje chen po'i skye ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: snying rje chen po'i skye ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: they do not see the arising of great compassion.

original: des snying rje chen po'i skye ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas /🔽snying rje chen po'i skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: des snying rje chen po'i skye ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas / snying rje chen po'i skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see the arising of great compassion.🔽They do not see the gateway to the arising of great compassion.

original: des snying rje chen po'i skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas /
analyzed: des snying rje chen po'i skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas /
translated: They do not see the gateway to the arising of great compassion.

analyzed: snying rje chen po'i tshogs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /

original: gsob nyid dang / gsog nyid du yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo //🔽des sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /🔽des sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas /
analyzed: gsob nyid dang / gsog nyid du yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo // des sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste / des sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas /
translated: They see it as hollow and void.🔽They do not see the reality and accomplishment of the distinct qualities of the Buddha.🔽They do not see the reality and accomplishment of the distinct qualities of the Buddha.

analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi skye ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //

analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi tshogs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /

original: gsob nyid dang / gsog nyid du yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo //🔽des rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: gsob nyid dang / gsog nyid du yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo // des rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: and they see it as hollow and void.🔽“They do not see the real, true state of the result of stream enterer,

analyzed: des rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas /

analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i skye ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //

original: des rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i skye ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas /🔽rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: des rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i skye ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //

analyzed: gsob nyid dang / gsog nyid du yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo // des lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /

analyzed: des lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas /

analyzed: gsob nyid dang / gsog nyid du yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo //

analyzed: des phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas /
translated: Since they do not see the door of arising of the fruit of non-returning,

analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i tshogs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /

original: gsob nyid dang / gsog nyid du yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo //
analyzed: gsob nyid dang / gsog nyid du yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo //
translated: They see it as hollow and void.

analyzed: des dgra bcom pa nyid kyi yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong @470a *//

analyzed: ste; des dgra bcom pa nyid kyi yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas /

analyzed: des dgra bcom pa nyid kyi skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas /

analyzed: des rang byang chub kyi yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /

analyzed: des rang byang chub kyi yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas /

translated: They do not see the arising of the real, perfect enlightenment of pratyekabuddhas.🔽They do not see the gateway to the arising of the real, perfect enlightenment of pratyekabuddhas.

original: rang byang chub kyi tshogs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: rang byang chub kyi tshogs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /

analyzed: gsob nyid dang; gsog nyid du yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo //

analyzed: des lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi yang @470b dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /

original: des lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas /
analyzed: des lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas /
translated: They do not see the reality or the accomplishment of the knowledge of path aspects,

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi skye ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽des lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi skye ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas /
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi skye ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // des lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi skye ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas /

analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi tshogs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /

original: gsob nyid dang / gsog nyid du yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo //
analyzed: gsob nyid dang / gsog nyid du yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo //
translated: They see it as empty, false, and void.🔽They do not see the reality or the accomplishment of the knowledge of all aspects,

original: des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: and so they do not see the production of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas /
analyzed: des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas /
translated: Since they do not see the reality of the knowledge of all aspects,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas /
translated: they do not see the arising of the knowledge of all aspects.🔽Since they do not see the arising of the knowledge of all aspects,

analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: they do not see the gateway to the arising of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas /
analyzed: des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas /
translated: Since they do not see the gateway to the arising of the knowledge of all aspects,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong @471a *//
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong @471a *//
translated: they do not see the accumulation of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: ste; gsob nyid dang / gsog nyid du yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo //
analyzed: ste; gsob nyid dang / gsog nyid du yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo //
translated: They see it as hollow and void.

original: de de ltar rtog pa'i tshe gzugs kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de de ltar rtog pa'i tshe gzugs kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
translated: When they contemplate in that way, they do not apprehend the intrinsic nature of form.

original: tshor ba'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
analyzed: tshor ba'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
translated: the nature of feeling is non-apprehensible,

original: 'du shes kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'du shes kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
translated: the nature of perception is non-apprehensible,

original: 'du byed kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'du byed kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
translated: the nature of volitional factors is non-apprehensible,

original: rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
translated: and the nature of consciousness is non-apprehensible.🔽The nature of the eyes is non-apprehensible,

original: mig gi rang bzhin mi dmigs so; ;rna ba'i rang bzhin ma dmigs so //🔽sna'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mig gi rang bzhin mi dmigs so; ;rna ba'i rang bzhin ma dmigs so // sna'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
translated: the nature of the ears is non-apprehensible,🔽the nature of the nose is non-apprehensible,

original: lce'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
analyzed: lce'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
translated: the nature of the tongue is non-apprehensible,

original: lus kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
analyzed: lus kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
translated: the nature of the body is non-apprehensible,🔽and the nature of the thinking mind is non-apprehensible.

original: yid kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so; ;gzugs kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
analyzed: yid kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so; ;gzugs kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
translated: The nature of a form is non-apprehensible,

original: sgra'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so //🔽dri'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sgra'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so // dri'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
translated: the nature of a sound is non-apprehensible,🔽the nature of a smell is non-apprehensible,

original: ro'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
analyzed: ro'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
translated: the nature of a taste is non-apprehensible,🔽the nature of a feeling is non-apprehensible,

original: reg gi rang bzhin mi dmigs so; ;chos kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
analyzed: reg gi rang bzhin mi dmigs so; ;chos kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
translated: and the nature of a dharma is non-apprehensible.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so //🔽rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so // rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
translated: The nature of eye consciousness is non-apprehensible,🔽the nature of ear consciousness is non-apprehensible,

original: sna'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sna'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
translated: the nature of nose consciousness is non-apprehensible,

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
translated: the nature of the tongue consciousness is non-apprehensible,

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
translated: the nature of the body consciousness is non-apprehensible,

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so //🔽mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so // mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
translated: and the nature of the mind consciousness is non-apprehensible.🔽The nature of the sensory element of the eyes is non-apprehensible,🔽the nature of the sensory element of sights is non-apprehensible,🔽the nature of the sensory element of visual consciousness is non-apprehensible,

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so //🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin @471b mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so // sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin @471b mi dmigs so //
translated: the nature of the sensory element of the ears is non-apprehensible,🔽the nature of the sensory element of sounds is non-apprehensible,🔽the nature of the sensory element of auditory consciousness is non-apprehensible,🔽the nature of the sensory element of the nose is non-apprehensible,🔽the nature of the sensory element of smells is non-apprehensible,🔽the nature of the sensory element of olfactory consciousness is non-apprehensible,

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so //🔽lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so // lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so //

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
translated: the nature of the sensory element of the mental faculty is non-apprehensible,🔽the nature of the sensory element of mental phenomena is non-apprehensible,🔽and the nature of the sensory element of mental consciousness is non-apprehensible.🔽The nature of the sensory domain of the eyes is non-apprehensible,🔽the nature of the sensory domain of sights is non-apprehensible,

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so //🔽rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
translated: the nature of the sensory domain of visual consciousness is non-apprehensible,🔽the nature of the sensory domain of the ears is non-apprehensible,🔽the nature of the sensory domain of sounds is non-apprehensible,🔽the nature of the sensory domain of auditory consciousness is non-apprehensible,

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
translated: the nature of the sensory domain of the nose is non-apprehensible,🔽the nature of the sensory domain of smells is non-apprehensible,🔽the nature of the sensory domain of olfactory consciousness is non-apprehensible,🔽the nature of the sensory domain of the tongue is non-apprehensible,🔽the nature of the sensory domain of tastes is non-apprehensible,🔽the nature of the sensory domain of gustatory consciousness is non-

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
translated: the nature of the condition of contact through tongue union is non-apprehensible,

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so; ;yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so; ;yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
translated: the nature of the condition of contact through body union is non-apprehensible, and the nature of the condition of contact through mind union is non-apprehensible.

original: sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
translated: The nature of the earth element is non-apprehensible,

original: chu'i khams kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
analyzed: chu'i khams kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
translated: the nature of the water element is non-apprehensible,

original: me'i khams kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //🔽rlung gi khams kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
analyzed: me'i khams kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so // rlung gi khams kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
