original: nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //🔽rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so // rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
translated: the nature of the space element is non-apprehensible,🔽and the nature of the consciousness element is non-apprehensible.

original: ma rig pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
analyzed: ma rig pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
translated: The nature of ignorance is non-apprehensible,

original: 'du byed kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'du byed kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
translated: the nature of volitional factors is non-apprehensible,

original: rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
translated: the nature of consciousness is non-apprehensible,

original: ming dang gzugs kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
translated: the nature of name and form is non-apprehensible,

original: skye mched drug gi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
analyzed: skye mched drug gi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
translated: the nature of the six sense fields is non-apprehensible,

original: reg pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
analyzed: reg pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
translated: the nature of contact is non-apprehensible,

original: tshor ba'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
analyzed: tshor ba'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
translated: the nature of sensation is non-apprehensible,

original: sred pa'i rang bzhin @472a *//🔽mi dmigs so //🔽len pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sred pa'i rang bzhin @472a *// mi dmigs so // len pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
translated: the nature of craving is non-apprehensible,🔽the nature of appropriation is non-apprehensible,

original: srid pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
analyzed: srid pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
translated: the nature of existence is non-apprehensible,

original: skye ba'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
analyzed: skye ba'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
translated: the nature of birth is non-apprehensible,

original: rga shi'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rga shi'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
translated: and the nature of old age and death is non-apprehensible.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
translated: The nature of the perfection of giving is non-apprehensible,

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
translated: the nature of the perfection of morality is non-apprehensible,

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
translated: the nature of the perfection of patience is non-apprehensible,

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
translated: the nature of the perfection of perseverance is non-apprehensible,

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin dmigs so; shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin dmigs so; shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
translated: the nature of the perfection of concentration is non-apprehensible, and the nature of the perfection of wisdom is non-apprehensible.

original: nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
translated: The nature of inner emptiness is non-apprehensible,

original: phyi stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
translated: the nature of external emptiness is non-apprehensible,

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so; ;stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so; ;stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
translated: the nature of external and internal emptiness is non-apprehensible, the nature of the emptiness of emptiness is non-apprehensible,

original: chen po stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
translated: the nature of great emptiness is non-apprehensible,

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so // 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
translated: the nature of ultimate emptiness is non-apprehensible,🔽the nature of conditioned emptiness is non-apprehensible,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
translated: the nature of unconditioned emptiness is non-apprehensible,

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //🔽thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so // thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
translated: the nature of the emptiness of what is beyond extremes is non-apprehensible,

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
translated: the nature of the emptiness of what is not to be discarded is non-apprehensible,

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs @472b so; ;chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs @472b so; ;chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
translated: the nature of the emptiness of inherent existence is non-apprehensible, and the nature of the emptiness of all things is non-apprehensible.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
translated: The nature of the emptiness of its own mark is non-apprehended.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
translated: The nature of the emptiness of non-apprehension is non-apprehended.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
translated: The nature of the emptiness of non-things is non-apprehended.🔽The nature of the emptiness of essential nature is non-apprehended.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
translated: The nature of the emptiness of the essential nature of non-things is non-apprehended.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
translated: The nature of the applications of mindfulness is non-apprehended.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
translated: The nature of the right efforts is non-apprehended.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //🔽dbang po rnams kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so // dbang po rnams kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
translated: The nature of the legs of manifestation is non-apprehended.🔽The nature of the faculties is non-apprehended.

original: stobs rnams kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
analyzed: stobs rnams kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
translated: The nature of the powers is non-apprehended.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
translated: The nature of the branches of enlightenment is non-apprehended.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
translated: The nature of the noble eightfold path is non-apprehended.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
translated: the nature of the four noble truths is non-apprehensible,

original: bsam gtan rnams kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
translated: the nature of the meditative concentrations is non-apprehensible,

original: tshad med pa rnams kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
translated: the nature of the immeasurable is non-apprehensible,

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
translated: the nature of the formless absorptions is non-apprehensible,

original: rnam par thar pa rnams kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
translated: the nature of the deliverances is non-apprehensible,

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //🔽stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so // stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
translated: the nature of the [meditative] entrances is non-apprehensible,🔽the nature of the emptiness meditative stabilization is non-apprehensible,

original: mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin mi dmigs @473a *//
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin mi dmigs @473a *//
translated: the nature of the signless meditative stabilization is non-apprehensible,

original: so; ;smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
analyzed: so; ;smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
translated: and the nature of the wishless meditative stabilization is non-apprehensible.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
translated: The nature of the [supernatural] abilities is non-apprehensible,

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
translated: the nature of the meditative stabilizations is non-apprehensible,

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
translated: and the nature of the dhāraṇī gateways is non-apprehensible.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
translated: the nature of the powers of the tathāgatas is non-apprehensible,

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
translated: the nature of the fearlessnesses is non-apprehensible,

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //🔽byams pa chen po'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so // byams pa chen po'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
translated: the nature of the detailed and thorough knowledges is non-apprehensible,🔽the nature of great love is non-apprehensible,

original: snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
analyzed: snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
translated: the nature of great compassion is non-apprehensible,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
translated: the nature of the distinct attributes of a buddha is non-apprehensible,

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
translated: the nature of the result of stream enterer is non-apprehensible,

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
translated: the nature of the result of once-returner is non-apprehensible,

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
translated: the nature of the result of non-returner is non-apprehensible,

original: dgra bcom pa nyid kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
translated: the nature of the state of a worthy one is non-apprehensible,

original: rang byang chub kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rang byang chub kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
translated: the nature of a pratyekabuddha’s awakening is non-apprehensible,

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
translated: the nature of the knowledge of path aspects is non-apprehensible,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
translated: He does not apprehend the intrinsic nature of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin de nyid du rtogs par byed de /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin de nyid du rtogs par byed de /
translated: When he practices the perfection of wisdom, he realizes that all dharmas are the intrinsic nature of nonexistence.

original: de de ltar rtogs par byed cing nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi stong @473b pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /
analyzed: de de ltar rtogs par byed cing nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi stong @473b pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /
translated: When he practices like that, he practices the emptiness of internal phenomena, he practices the emptiness of external phenomena, he practices the emptiness of external and internal phenomena, he practices the emptiness of emptiness, he practices the emptiness of great extent,

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /
translated: he practices the emptiness of ultimate reality, he practices the emptiness of conditioned phenomena, he practices the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, he practices the emptiness of the unlimited, he practices the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end,

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /
translated: They are the emptiness of non-rejection, the emptiness of nature, the emptiness of all phenomena, the emptiness of intrinsic characteristics, the emptiness of non-apprehension,🔽the emptiness of non-entities, the emptiness of essential nature, and the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: When they practice the emptiness of form,🔽the emptiness of feeling,

original: gzugs sam / tshor ba'am; 'du shes sam /
analyzed: gzugs sam / tshor ba'am; 'du shes sam /
translated: the emptiness of perception,

original: 'du byed dam /
analyzed: 'du byed dam /
translated: the emptiness of formation,

original: rnam par shes pa'am /🔽mig gam / rna ba'am /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'am / mig gam / rna ba'am /
translated: and the emptiness of consciousness,🔽the emptiness of the eyes,

original: sna'am / lce'am /
analyzed: sna'am / lce'am /
translated: the emptiness of the ears,🔽the emptiness of the nose,🔽the emptiness of the tongue,🔽the emptiness of the body,

original: lus sam / yid dam /
analyzed: lus sam / yid dam /
translated: and the emptiness of the mind,🔽the emptiness of sights,

original: gzugs sam / sgra'am /
analyzed: gzugs sam / sgra'am /
translated: the emptiness of sounds,

original: dri'am / ro'am /
analyzed: dri'am / ro'am /
translated: the emptiness of smells,🔽the emptiness of tastes,🔽the emptiness of textures,

original: reg gam / chos sam /
analyzed: reg gam / chos sam /
translated: and the emptiness of mental phenomena,

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa'am /🔽rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'am /🔽sna'i rnam par shes pa'am /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa'am / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'am / sna'i rnam par shes pa'am /
translated: the emptiness of the eye consciousness,🔽the emptiness of the ear consciousness,🔽the emptiness of the nose consciousness,

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa'am /
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa'am /
translated: the emptiness of the tongue consciousness,🔽and the emptiness of the body consciousness,

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'am /
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'am /
translated: the body consciousness,

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'am /
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'am /
translated: or the mind consciousness,

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'am /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'am /
translated: or the eye contact,

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'am /🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa'am /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'am / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'am /
translated: or the ear contact,🔽or the nose contact,

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'am /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'am /

analyzed: dbang po rnams sam /

analyzed: stobs rnams sam /

analyzed: bsam gtan rnams sam /

analyzed: tshad med pa rnams sam /

analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam /

original: rnam par thar pa rnams sam /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams sam /

analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams sam /

analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams sam /

analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam /

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam; mi 'jigs pa rnams sam /

analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam / byams pa chen po'am /

analyzed: snying rje chen po'am /

analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam /

analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'am /

analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am /
translated: the result of once-returner;

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am /
translated: the result of non-returner;

original: dgra bcom pa nyid dam /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid dam /
translated: the state of a worthy one;

original: rang byang chub bam /
analyzed: rang byang chub bam /
translated: a pratyekabuddha’s awakening;

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i @475a *//🔽byang chub bam /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i @475a *// byang chub bam /
translated: unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening;

original: chos gang la'ang mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: chos gang la'ang mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: or any dharma at all.

original: de dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe byang chub kyi lam yongs su rdzogs par byed de /
analyzed: de dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe byang chub kyi lam yongs su rdzogs par byed de /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, the non-entity nature, they complete the path to enlightenment.

original: 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
analyzed: 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
translated: Thus, they complete the perfection of generosity, the perfection of moral discipline, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the perfection of wisdom, inner emptiness, outer emptiness, inner and outer emptiness, the emptiness of emptiness, great emptiness, the emptiness of ultimate reality,

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the emptiness of conditioned phenomena, the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, the emptiness of what is beyond extremes, the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless, the emptiness of non-rejection, the emptiness of inherent existence,

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the emptiness of all phenomena, the emptiness of intrinsic characteristics, the emptiness of non-observation, the emptiness of non-entities, the emptiness of essential nature, and the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag @475b brgyad pa dang /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag @475b brgyad pa dang /
translated: the four establishments of mindfulness, the four right efforts, the four legs of magical manifestation, the five faculties, the five powers, the seven branches of enlightenment, and the eightfold noble path,

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /🔽mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /🔽byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed de /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed de /
