original: de byang chub kyi lam rnam par smin pa'i chos can la gnas pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
analyzed: de byang chub kyi lam rnam par smin pa'i chos can la gnas pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
translated: They are the perfection of generosity, the perfection of moral discipline, the perfection of patience,🔽the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration, the perfection of wisdom, the perfection of inner emptiness,🔽the perfection of outer emptiness, the perfection of outer and inner emptiness, the perfection of the emptiness of emptiness,🔽the perfection of great emptiness, the perfection of ultimate emptiness, the perfection of the conditioned, the perfection of the unconditioned,

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang / nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang /🔽phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang / stong @476a *//
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang / nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang /🔽phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang / stong @476a *//
translated: the perfection of the limitless, the perfection of the absence of attributes, the perfection of the absence of anything to be done, the perfection of the absence of any basis for the arising of anything, the perfection of the absence of any basis for the arising of anything whatsoever,🔽the perfection of the knowledge of all aspects, the perfection of the knowledge of paths, the perfection of the knowledge of all things, the perfection of the knowledge of the aspects of the path, the perfection of the knowledge of the aspects of the path of training, the perfection of the knowledge of the aspects of the path of no more training, the perfection of the knowledge of the aspects of the path of training and the path of no more training,🔽the perfection of the knowledge of the aspects of the path of the śrāvakas, the perfection of the knowledge of the aspects of the path of the pratyekabuddhas, the perfection of the knowledge of the aspects of the path of the buddhas, the perfection of the knowledge of the aspects of the path of the śrāvakas and the pratyekabuddhas, the perfection of the knowledge of the aspects of the path of the buddhas, the perfection of the knowledge of the aspects of the path of the śrāvakas, the pratyekabuddhas, and the buddhas,🔽the perfection of the knowledge of the aspects of the path of the śrāvakas, the pratyekabuddhas, and the buddhas, the perfection of the knowledge of the aspects of the path of the śrāvakas, the pratyekabuddhas, and the buddhas, the perfection of the knowledge of the aspects of the path of the śrāvakas, the pratyekabuddhas, and the buddhas, the perfection of the knowledge of the aspects of the path of the śrāvakas, the pratyekabuddhas, and the buddhas, the perfection of the knowledge of the aspects of the path of the śrāvakas,

original: pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang /🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
analyzed: pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
translated: the perfection of the emptiness of the conditioned, the perfection of the emptiness of the unconditioned,🔽the perfection of the emptiness of what is beyond extremes, the perfection of the emptiness of what is without beginning or end, the perfection of the emptiness of nonrepudiation, the perfection of the emptiness of nature,

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
translated: the perfection of the emptiness of all phenomena, the perfection of the emptiness of defining characteristics, the perfection of the emptiness of nonobservation, the perfection of the emptiness of the essential nature of nonexistence,

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs pa dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs pa dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
translated: the emptiness of essential nature, the emptiness of the essential nature of non-things, the four perfect endeavors,

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs pa dang / dbang po lnga yongs su rdzogs pa dang / stobs lnga yongs su rdzogs pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yongs su rdzogs pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs pa dang / dbang po lnga yongs su rdzogs pa dang / stobs lnga yongs su rdzogs pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yongs su rdzogs pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
translated: the four legs of manifestation, the five faculties, the five powers, the seven branches of enlightenment, and the eightfold noble path,

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi yongs su rdzogs @476b pa dang / tshad med pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi yongs su rdzogs @476b pa dang / tshad med pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
translated: the four perfect abandonments, the four legs of magical emanation, the five powers, the five strengths, the seven branches of enlightenment, and the eightfold noble path;🔽the four concentrations, the four immeasurables, and the four formless absorptions; the five clairvoyances that are the result of maturation; and the three gateways to liberation.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum yongs su rdzogs pa dang / rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa lnga yongs su rdzogs par gyur nas sems can gang la sbyin pas phan gdags par bya ba de dag la'ang sbyin pas phan 'dogs so //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum yongs su rdzogs pa dang / rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa lnga yongs su rdzogs par gyur nas sems can gang la sbyin pas phan gdags par bya ba de dag la'ang sbyin pas phan 'dogs so //
translated: He benefits those beings who are to be benefited by generosity with generosity.

original: gang la tshul khrims kyis phan gdags par bya ba de dag la'ang tshul khrims kyis phan 'dogs so //
analyzed: gang la tshul khrims kyis phan gdags par bya ba de dag la'ang tshul khrims kyis phan 'dogs so //
translated: He benefits those who are to be benefited by ethical discipline with ethical discipline.

original: gang la bzod pas phan gdags par bya ba de dag la'ang bzod pas phan 'dogs so //
analyzed: gang la bzod pas phan gdags par bya ba de dag la'ang bzod pas phan 'dogs so //
translated: Those who are to be benefited by patience, they are benefited by patience.

original: gang la brtson 'grus kyis phan gdags par bya ba de dag la'ang brtson 'grus kyis phan 'dogs so //
analyzed: gang la brtson 'grus kyis phan gdags par bya ba de dag la'ang brtson 'grus kyis phan 'dogs so //
translated: Those who are to be benefited by effort, they are benefited by effort.

original: gang la bsam gtan gyis phan gdags par bya ba de dag la'ang bsam gtan gyis phan 'dogs so //
analyzed: gang la bsam gtan gyis phan gdags par bya ba de dag la'ang bsam gtan gyis phan 'dogs so //
translated: Those who are to be benefited by concentration, they are benefited by concentration.

original: gang la shes rab kyis phan gdags par bya ba de dag la'ang shes rab kyis phan 'dogs so //
analyzed: gang la shes rab kyis phan gdags par bya ba de dag la'ang shes rab kyis phan 'dogs so //
translated: Those who are to be benefited by wisdom, they are benefited by wisdom.

original: gang la rnam par grol bas phan gdags par bya ba de dag la'ang rnam par grol bas phan 'dogs so //
analyzed: gang la rnam par grol bas phan gdags par bya ba de dag la'ang rnam par grol bas phan 'dogs so //
translated: Those who are to be benefited by liberation, they are benefited by liberation.

original: gang la rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas phan gdags par bya ba de dag la'ang rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas phan 'dogs so //
analyzed: gang la rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas phan gdags par bya ba de dag la'ang rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas phan 'dogs so //
translated: Those who are to be benefited by the vision of the wisdom of liberation, they are benefited by the vision of the wisdom of liberation.

original: gang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod @477a *//
analyzed: gang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod @477a *//
translated: Those who are to be established in the fruit of stream-entry,

original: par bya ba de dag kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god do //
analyzed: par bya ba de dag kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god do //
translated: Those who should be established in the fruit of stream enterer, they too are established in the fruit of stream enterer.

original: gang lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya ba de dag kyang lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god do //
analyzed: gang lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya ba de dag kyang lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god do //
translated: Those who should be established in the fruit of once-returner, they too are established in the fruit of once-returner.

original: gang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya ba de dag kyang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god do //
analyzed: gang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya ba de dag kyang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god do //
translated: Those who should be established in the fruit of non-returner, they too are established in the fruit of non-returner.

original: gang dgra bcom pa nyid la dgod par bya ba de dag kyang dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu 'god do //
analyzed: gang dgra bcom pa nyid la dgod par bya ba de dag kyang dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu 'god do //
translated: Those who should be established in the state of a worthy one, they too are established in the state of a worthy one.

original: gang rang byang chub la dgod par bya ba de dag kyang rang byang chub la rab tu 'god do //
analyzed: gang rang byang chub la dgod par bya ba de dag kyang rang byang chub la rab tu 'god do //
translated: Those who should be established in a pratyekabuddha’s awakening, they too are established in a pratyekabuddha’s awakening.

original: gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod par bya ba de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu 'god do //
analyzed: gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod par bya ba de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu 'god do //
translated: Those who should be established in unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening, they too are established in unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: de rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa du mas rnam par 'phrul zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'gro ste /
analyzed: de rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa du mas rnam par 'phrul zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'gro ste /
translated: He goes to as many world systems as there are grains of sand in the Ganges River, displaying many kinds of miracles.

original: de 'dod na 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag rin po che gang las 'dod pa'i rin po che de dag las grub par mngon par sgrub ste /
analyzed: de 'dod na 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag rin po che gang las 'dod pa'i rin po che de dag las grub par mngon par sgrub ste /
translated: If he wishes, he can manifest as many world systems as there are grains of sand in the Ganges River, all made of whatever precious substance he desires.

original: de sems can rnams kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed cing 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro ste /
analyzed: de sems can rnams kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed cing 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro ste /
translated: He goes from world system to world system, fulfilling the wishes of beings.

original: des 'jig rten gyi khams de dag mthong nas ci 'dod par sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin te /
analyzed: des 'jig rten gyi khams de dag mthong nas ci 'dod par sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin te /
translated: When he sees those world systems, he takes possession of a buddhafield as he wishes.

original: 'di ltar dper na /
analyzed: 'di ltar dper na /
translated: It is like this:

original: gzhan 'phrul @477b dbang byed kyi lha'i ris kyi longs spyod dang / skyid pa lta bu dag dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan bcal ba dang bral ba dag na longs spyod dang / skyid pa gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag der 'byung ste; de rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
analyzed: gzhan 'phrul @477b dbang byed kyi lha'i ris kyi longs spyod dang / skyid pa lta bu dag dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan bcal ba dang bral ba dag na longs spyod dang / skyid pa gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag der 'byung ste; de rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
translated: The perfection of generosity that arises from that maturation,🔽the perfection of discipline that arises from that maturation,🔽the perfection of patience that arises from that maturation,

original: rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
analyzed: rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
translated: the perfection of diligence that arises from that maturation,

original: rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa rnams dang / rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i byang chub kyi lam des lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid la spyod cing /
analyzed: rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa rnams dang / rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i byang chub kyi lam des lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid la spyod cing /
translated: the perfection of concentration arisen from ripening, the perfection of wisdom arisen from ripening, the superknowledges arisen from ripening, and the path to enlightenment arisen from ripening, and

original: chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa thob nas /
analyzed: chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa thob nas /
translated: having attained the perfection of all dharmas,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob ste /
translated: attain the knowledge of all aspects.🔽“To the extent that form is ungraspable,🔽feeling is ungraspable,🔽perception is ungraspable,🔽volitional factors are ungraspable,

original: gal te ji tsam du gzugs yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / tshor ba yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / 'du shes yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su bzung ba med pa dang /
analyzed: gal te ji tsam du gzugs yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / tshor ba yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / 'du shes yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su bzung ba med pa dang /
translated: and consciousness is ungraspable,

original: mig yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / rna ba yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / sna yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / lce yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / lus yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / yid yongs su bzung ba med pa dang /🔽@478a *// gzugs yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / sgra yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / dri yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / ro yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / reg yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / chos yongs su bzung ba med pa dang /
analyzed: mig yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / rna ba yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / sna yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / lce yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / lus yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / yid yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / @478a *// gzugs yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / sgra yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / dri yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / ro yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / reg yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / chos yongs su bzung ba med pa dang /
translated: It is to not grasp at the eyes. It is to not grasp at the ears, nose, tongue, body, or mind.🔽It is to not grasp at sights. It is to not grasp at sounds, smells, tastes, textures, or mental phenomena.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa yongs su bzung ba med pa dang /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa yongs su bzung ba med pa dang /
translated: It is to not grasp at the eye consciousness. It is to not grasp at the ear, nose, tongue, body, or mind consciousnesses.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su bzung ba med pa dang /🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su bzung ba med pa dang /
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su bzung ba med pa dang /
translated: It is the absence of apprehending the consciousness of the eyes, the absence of apprehending the consciousness of the ears, the absence of apprehending the consciousness of the nose, the absence of apprehending the consciousness of the tongue, the absence of apprehending the consciousness of the body, and the absence of apprehending the consciousness of the mental faculty.🔽It is the absence of apprehending the sensory element of the eyes, the absence of apprehending the sensory element of sights, the absence of apprehending the sensory element of visual consciousness, the absence of apprehending the sensory element of the ears, the absence of apprehending the sensory element of sounds, the absence of apprehending the sensory element of auditory consciousness, the absence of apprehending the sensory element of the nose, the absence of apprehending the sensory element of odors, the absence of apprehending the sensory element of olfactory consciousness, the absence of apprehending the sensory element of the tongue, the absence of apprehending the sensory element of tastes, the absence of apprehending the sensory element of gustatory consciousness, the absence of apprehending the sensory element of the body, the absence of apprehending the sensory element of tangibles, the absence of apprehending the sensory element of tactile consciousness, the absence of apprehending the sensory element of the mental faculty, the absence of apprehending the sensory element of mental phenomena, and the absence of apprehending the sensory element of mental consciousness.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su bzung ba med pa dang /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su bzung ba med pa dang /
translated: It is the absence of apprehending the sensory element of the eyes, the absence of apprehending the sensory element of sights, the absence of apprehending the sensory element of visual consciousness, the absence of apprehending the sensory element of the ears, the absence of apprehending the sensory element of sounds, the absence of apprehending the sensory element of auditory consciousness, the absence of apprehending the sensory element of the nose, the absence of apprehending the sensory element of odors, the absence of apprehending the sensory element of olfactory consciousness, the absence of apprehending the sensory element of the tongue, the absence of apprehending the sensory element of tastes, the absence of apprehending the sensory element of gustatory consciousness, the absence of apprehending the sensory element of the body, the absence of apprehending the sensory element of tangibles, the absence of apprehending the sensory element of tactile consciousness, the absence of apprehending the sensory element of the mental faculty, the absence of apprehending the sensory element of mental phenomena, and the absence of apprehending the sensory element of mental consciousness.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su @478b bzung ba med pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su bzung ba med pa dang /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su @478b bzung ba med pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su bzung ba med pa dang /
translated: It is to be free of apprehending the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact between tongue and taste, the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact between body and touch, and the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact between mind and mental phenomena.

original: sa'i khams yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / chu'i khams yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / me'i khams yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / rlung gi khams yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / nam mkha'i khams yongs su bzung ba med pa dang /
analyzed: sa'i khams yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / chu'i khams yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / me'i khams yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / rlung gi khams yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / nam mkha'i khams yongs su bzung ba med pa dang /
translated: It is to be free of apprehending the earth element, the water element, the fire element, the wind element, and the space element.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / ma rig pa yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / ming dang gzugs yongs su bzung ba med pa dang /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / ma rig pa yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / ming dang gzugs yongs su bzung ba med pa dang /
translated: It is to be free of apprehending the consciousness element, ignorance, formation, consciousness, name and form,

original: skye mched drug yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / reg pa yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / tshor ba yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / sred pa yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / len pa yongs su bzung ba med pa dang /
analyzed: skye mched drug yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / reg pa yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / tshor ba yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / sred pa yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / len pa yongs su bzung ba med pa dang /
translated: the six sense sources, contact, feeling, craving, grasping,

original: srid pa yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / skye ba yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / rga shi yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / de bzhin du dge ba'i chos rnams yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / mi dge ba'i chos rnams yongs su bzung ba med pa dang /
analyzed: srid pa yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / skye ba yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / rga shi yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / de bzhin du dge ba'i chos rnams yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / mi dge ba'i chos rnams yongs su bzung ba med pa dang /
translated: existence, birth, and aging and death are not appropriated. Similarly, virtuous and nonvirtuous phenomena are not appropriated.

original: 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / zag pa med pa'i chos rnams yongs su bzung ba @479a *//
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / zag pa med pa'i chos rnams yongs su bzung ba @479a *//
translated: Mundane and supramundane phenomena are not appropriated. Phenomena with defilements and without defilements are not appropriated.

original: med pa dang / 'dus byas kyi chos rnams yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams yongs su bzung ba med pa de bzhin du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing der longs spyod pa dang /
analyzed: med pa dang / 'dus byas kyi chos rnams yongs su bzung ba med pa dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams yongs su bzung ba med pa de bzhin du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing der longs spyod pa dang /
translated: Just as there is no grasping at the unconditioned, and there is no grasping at conditioned phenomena, and there is no grasping at unconditioned phenomena, in the same way, after fully awakening to unsurpassed and perfect buddhahood, in that buddha realm, there will be no grasping at enjoyments,🔽

original: skyid pa thams cad yongs su bzung ba med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: skyid pa thams cad yongs su bzung ba med par 'gyur ro //
translated: Just as conditioned phenomena are ungraspable, and unconditioned phenomena are ungraspable, in the same way, after fully awakening to unsurpassed and perfect buddhahood, all enjoyments and happiness in that buddha realm will be ungraspable.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di ltar chos thams cad ni /
analyzed: 'di ltar chos thams cad ni /
translated: Because all phenomena

original: dmigs su med pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bzung ba med pa ste /
analyzed: dmigs su med pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bzung ba med pa ste /
translated: are ungraspable in the sense that they are unobservable.

original: chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba med pa'i phyir yang sems can rnams la chos ston to //
analyzed: chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba med pa'i phyir yang sems can rnams la chos ston to //
translated: Because all phenomena are ungraspable, they teach the Dharma to sentient beings.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang / byed pa med pa dang / dmigs su med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang / byed pa med pa dang / dmigs su med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang /
translated: Subhuti: Thus, then, should the Bodhisattva, the great being, course in the perfection of wisdom.🔽

original: mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin te /
translated: Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom in that way complete the perfection of wisdom in all dharmas without defining characteristics, without performance, without apprehension, without origin,🔽and without production.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na /
translated: Subhūti, in that way

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang / byed pa med pa dang / dmigs su med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang / byed pa med pa dang / dmigs su med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: when bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom in that way complete the perfection of generosity in all dharmas without defining characteristics, without performance, without apprehension, without origin, and without production.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par @479b 'gyur ro //🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par @479b 'gyur ro // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: they will complete the perfection of morality;🔽they will complete the perfection of patience;

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: they will complete the perfection of perseverance;

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: they will complete the perfection of concentration;

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: they will complete the perfection of wisdom;

original: nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: they will complete inner emptiness;

original: phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro; ;phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro; ;phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: they will complete outer emptiness; they will complete inner and outer emptiness;

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: they will complete the emptiness of emptiness;

original: chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: they will complete great emptiness;

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: they will complete ultimate emptiness;

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: the emptiness of the conditioned will be completed,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: the emptiness of the unconditioned will be completed,

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: the emptiness of what transcends limits will be completed,

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: the emptiness of the beginning and end will be completed,

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: the emptiness of non-rejection will be completed,

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: the emptiness of inherent existence will be completed,

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: the emptiness of all things will be completed,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics will be completed,

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //🔽dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro // dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: the emptiness of non-apprehension will be completed,🔽the emptiness of the absence of intrinsic nature will be completed,

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //🔽dngos po med pa'i ngo @480a *//
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //🔽dngos po med pa'i ngo @480a *//
translated: and the emptiness of the intrinsic nature will be completed.

original: bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: the emptiness of essential nature will be perfected;

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: the applications of mindfulness will be perfected;

original: yang dag par spong ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: the right efforts will be perfected;

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //🔽dbang po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro // dbang po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: the legs of miraculous power will be perfected;🔽the faculties will be perfected;

original: stobs yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: stobs yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: the powers will be perfected;

original: byang chub kyi yan lag yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: the branches of enlightenment will be perfected;🔽the noble eightfold path will be perfected;🔽the noble truths will be perfected;🔽the meditative stabilizations will be perfected;🔽the immeasurables will be perfected;

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //🔽'phags pa'i bden pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro // 'phags pa'i bden pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: the formless absorptions will be perfected;🔽the liberations will be perfected;🔽the concentrations will be perfected;🔽the meditative stabilizations will be perfected;🔽the doors of concentration will be perfected;🔽the doors of liberation will be perfected;🔽the emptiness gate of liberation will be perfected;🔽the signlessness gate of liberation will be perfected;🔽the wishlessness gate of liberation will be perfected;🔽the eight deliverances will be perfected;🔽the nine serial absorptions will be perfected;🔽the ten universal bases will be perfected;🔽the five eyes will be perfected;🔽the six superknowledges will be perfected;🔽the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening will be perfected;🔽the ten powers of the Tathāgata will be perfected;🔽the four fearlessnesses will be perfected;🔽the four detailed and thorough knowledges will be perfected;🔽the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha will be perfected;🔽the thirty-two major marks of a great person will be perfected;🔽the eighty minor marks will be perfected;🔽the great love will be perfected;🔽the great compassion will be perfected;🔽the great joy will be perfected;🔽the great equanimity will be perfected;

original: bsam gtan yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //🔽tshad med pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bsam gtan yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro // tshad med pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: the thirty-seven aids to enlightenment will be perfected;🔽the ten powers of a tathāgata will be perfected;🔽the four fearlessnesses will be perfected;🔽the four detailed and thorough knowledges will be perfected;

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha will be perfected;🔽the thirty-two major marks of a great person will be perfected;🔽the eighty minor marks will be perfected;🔽the great love will be perfected;🔽the great compassion will be perfected;🔽the great joy will be perfected;🔽the great equanimity will be perfected;

original: rnam par thar pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: the thirty-seven factors of awakening will be perfected;🔽the ten powers of the Tathāgata will be perfected;🔽the four fearlessnesses will be perfected;🔽the four detailed and thorough knowled

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: the meditative absorption of progressive abiding will be perfected;

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: the gateways to liberation—emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness—will be perfected;

original: mngon par shes pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: the superknowledges will be perfected;

original: ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: meditative absorption will be perfected;

original: gzungs kyi sgo yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: the dhāraṇī gateways will be perfected;

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: the powers of the thus-gone ones will be perfected;

original: mi 'jigs pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: fearlessness will be perfected;

original: so so yang dag par rig @480b rig  pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //🔽byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig @480b rig  pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro // byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: correct understanding will be perfected;🔽great love will be perfected;

original: snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: great compassion will be perfected;

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: and the unique qualities of the buddhas will be perfected.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las /
translated: The Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines

original: le'u drug cu rtsa gcig pa'o ////
analyzed: le'u drug cu rtsa gcig pa'o ////
translated: Chapter Sixty-One

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa //
translated: The Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines

original: bam po nyis brgya don drug pa //
analyzed: bam po nyis brgya don drug pa //
translated: Volume Two Hundred and Six

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then the venerable Subhūti said to the Blessed One:

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: de ltar chos thams cad dbyer ma mchis shing mtshan ma mchis la /
analyzed: de ltar chos thams cad dbyer ma mchis shing mtshan ma mchis la /
translated: if all phenomena are undifferentiated, signless,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid lags na /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid lags na /
translated: and empty of their own characteristics,

original: ji ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
analyzed: ji ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
translated: how are there six perfections—the perfection of generosity, the perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of diligence, the perfection of concentration, and the perfection of wisdom?

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur; zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang ji ltar na tha dad du gyur par gda' ba lags /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur; zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang ji ltar na tha dad du gyur par gda' ba lags /
translated: How is it that those dharmas with outflows and those without outflows are differentiated?

original: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'dus pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'dus pa lags /
translated: How is the perfection of giving included in the perfection of wisdom?

original: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dus pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dus pa lags /
translated: How is the perfection of morality included in the perfection of wisdom?

original: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa @481a *//🔽'dus pa lags /🔽ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dus pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa @481a *// 'dus pa lags / ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dus pa lags /
translated: How is the perfection of patience included in the perfection of wisdom?🔽How is the perfection of effort included in the perfection of wisdom?

original: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dus pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dus pa lags /
translated: How is the perfection of concentration included in the perfection of wisdom?

original: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dus pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dus pa lags /
translated: How is the perfection of wisdom included in the perfection of wisdom?

original: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par nang stong pa nyid 'dus pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par nang stong pa nyid 'dus pa lags /
translated: How is the emptiness of internal phenomena included in the perfection of wisdom?

original: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par phyi stong pa nyid 'dus pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par phyi stong pa nyid 'dus pa lags /
translated: How is the emptiness of external phenomena included in the perfection of wisdom?

original: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par phyi nang stong pa nyid 'dus pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par phyi nang stong pa nyid 'dus pa lags /
translated: How is the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena included in the perfection of wisdom?

original: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'dus pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'dus pa lags /
translated: How is the emptiness of emptiness included in the perfection of wisdom?

original: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par chen po stong po nyid 'dus pa lags /🔽ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par don dam pa stong pa nyid 'dus pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par chen po stong po nyid 'dus pa lags / ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par don dam pa stong pa nyid 'dus pa lags /
translated: How is the emptiness of great extent included in the perfection of wisdom?🔽How is the emptiness of ultimate reality included in the perfection of wisdom?

original: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'dus pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'dus pa lags /
translated: How is the emptiness of conditioned phenomena included in the perfection of wisdom?

original: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'dus pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'dus pa lags /
translated: How is the emptiness of the unconditioned included in the perfection of wisdom?

original: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'dus pa lags /🔽ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid 'dus pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'dus pa lags / ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid 'dus pa lags /
translated: How is the emptiness of what is beyond extremes included in the perfection of wisdom?🔽How is the emptiness of what is endless and beginningless included in the perfection of wisdom?

original: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par dor ba med pa stong pa nyid 'dus pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par dor ba med pa stong pa nyid 'dus pa lags /
translated: How is the emptiness of nonrepudiation included in the perfection of wisdom?

original: ji ltar @481b shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'dus pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar @481b shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'dus pa lags /
translated: How is the emptiness of nature included in the perfection of wisdom?

original: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'dus pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'dus pa lags /
translated: How is the emptiness of all phenomena included in the perfection of wisdom?

original: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'dus pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'dus pa lags /
translated: How is the emptiness of defining characteristics included in the perfection of wisdom?

original: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid 'dus pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid 'dus pa lags /
translated: How is the emptiness of nonobservation included in the perfection of wisdom?

original: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par dngos po med pa stong pa nyid 'dus pa lags /🔽ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'dus pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par dngos po med pa stong pa nyid 'dus pa lags / ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'dus pa lags /
translated: How is the emptiness of non-things included in the perfection of wisdom?🔽How is the emptiness of essential nature included in the perfection of wisdom?

original: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'dus pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'dus pa lags /
translated: How is the emptiness of the essential nature of non-things included in the perfection of wisdom?

original: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams 'dus pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams 'dus pa lags /
translated: How are the applications of mindfulness included in the perfection of wisdom?

original: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par yang dag par spong ba rnams 'dus pa lags /🔽ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams 'dus pa lags /🔽ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par dbang po rnams 'dus pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par yang dag par spong ba rnams 'dus pa lags / ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams 'dus pa lags / ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par dbang po rnams 'dus pa lags /
translated: How are the right efforts included in the perfection of wisdom?🔽How are the bases of supernatural power included in the perfection of wisdom?🔽How are the faculties included in the perfection of wisdom?

original: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par stobs rnams 'dus pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par stobs rnams 'dus pa lags /
translated: How are the powers included in the perfection of wisdom?

original: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 'dus pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 'dus pa lags /
translated: How are the factors of awakening included in the perfection of wisdom?

original: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'dus pa lags /🔽ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'phags pa'i @482a *//
analyzed: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'dus pa lags / ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'phags pa'i @482a *//
translated: How is the noble eightfold path included in the perfection of wisdom?

original: bden pa rnams 'dus pa lags /
analyzed: bden pa rnams 'dus pa lags /
translated: How are the noble truths included in the perfection of wisdom?

original: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par bsam gtan rnams 'dus pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par bsam gtan rnams 'dus pa lags /
translated: How are the concentrations included in the perfection of wisdom?

original: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par tshad med pa rnams 'dus pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par tshad med pa rnams 'dus pa lags /
translated: How are the immeasurables included in the perfection of wisdom?

original: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'dus pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'dus pa lags /
translated: How are the formless absorptions included in the perfection of wisdom?

original: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rnam par thar pa rnams 'dus pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rnam par thar pa rnams 'dus pa lags /

original: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'dus pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'dus pa lags /
translated: How are the serial absorptions included in the perfection of wisdom?

original: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa 'dus pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa 'dus pa lags /
translated: How are the emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness gateways to liberation included in the perfection of wisdom?

original: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par mngon par shes pa rnams 'dus pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par mngon par shes pa rnams 'dus pa lags /

original: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ting nge 'dzin rnams 'dus pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ting nge 'dzin rnams 'dus pa lags /
translated: How are the meditative stabilizations included in the perfection of wisdom?

original: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'dus pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'dus pa lags /

analyzed: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams 'dus pa lags /

analyzed: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par mi 'jigs pa rnams 'dus pa lags //

analyzed: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par so so yang dag par rig pa rnams 'dus pa lags /

analyzed: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par snying rje chen po 'dus pa lags /

analyzed: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 'dus pa lags /

original: bcom ldan 'das /
