translated: He perfects the emptiness of the ultimate.🔽He perfects the emptiness of the conditioned.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the emptiness of the unconditioned.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //🔽thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do // thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.🔽He perfects the emptiness of what has no beginning or end.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the emptiness of nonrepudiation.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the emptiness of specific characteristics.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the emptiness of non-entities.🔽He perfects the emptiness of essential nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.

original: stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the concentration on emptiness.

original: mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the signless concentration.

original: smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the wishless concentration.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the eight liberations.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par byed @485a *//
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par byed @485a *//
translated: He perfects the nine serial absorptions.

original: do; ;mngon par shes pa lnga yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: do; ;mngon par shes pa lnga yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the five higher knowledges.

original: ting nge 'dzin thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects all the concentrations.

original: gzungs kyi sgo lnga brgya yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo lnga brgya yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He will perfect the five hundred dhāraṇī gateways.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He will perfect the four forms of correct understanding.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He will perfect the ten powers of the tathāgatas.

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do //🔽byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do // byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He will perfect the four forms of fearlessness.🔽He will perfect great love.

original: snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He will perfect great compassion.🔽He will perfect the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do; ;de 'phags pa'i chos byang ba 'jig rten las 'das pa thun mong ma yin pa rnam par smin pa las byung ba rnams la gnas shing phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do; ;de 'phags pa'i chos byang ba 'jig rten las 'das pa thun mong ma yin pa rnam par smin pa las byung ba rnams la gnas shing phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs
translated: “He will abide in the pure, supramundane, and unshared qualities of the noble ones that arise from the ripening of karma. He will be able to travel to the limitless and countless world systems in the ten directions.

original: med dpag tu med pa dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag gi drung du rdzu 'phrul gyis song zhing na bza' dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / snyun gyi rkyen sman dang /
analyzed: med dpag tu med pa dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag gi drung du rdzu 'phrul gyis song zhing na bza' dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / snyun gyi rkyen sman dang /
translated: and the blessed buddhas who are present, living, and teaching in the countless world systems of the ten directions, I will go to them by means of my miraculous powers and offer them my robes, alms, bedding, and medicines for the sick.🔽

original: yo byad mang pos bsnyen bkur byed de /
analyzed: yo byad mang pos bsnyen bkur byed de /
translated: He goes to the presence of all the Blessed Buddhas who are present, alive, and enduring in infinite world systems, and he serves them with many kinds of offerings of robes, alms-food, bedding, seats, remedies for exhaustion, and medicinal herbs.

original: longs spyod dang / skyid pa thams cad kyis kyang sems can rnams kyi don byed do //
analyzed: longs spyod dang / skyid pa thams cad kyis kyang sems can rnams kyi don byed do //
translated: He serves them with all kinds of enjoyments and pleasures, and he works for the welfare of sentient beings.

original: de na sems can gang sbyin pas yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang sbyin pas yongs su sdud do //
analyzed: de na sems can gang sbyin pas yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang sbyin pas yongs su sdud do //
translated: He gathers those who are to be gathered by generosity with generosity.

original: gang tshul khrims kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang tshul khrims @485b kyis yongs su sdud do //
analyzed: gang tshul khrims kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang tshul khrims @485b kyis yongs su sdud do //
translated: He gathers those who are to be gathered by morality with morality.

original: gang bzod pas yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang bzod pas yongs su sdud do //
analyzed: gang bzod pas yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang bzod pas yongs su sdud do //
translated: He gathers those who are to be gathered by patience with patience.

original: gang brtson 'grus kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang brtson 'grus kyis yongs su sdud do //
analyzed: gang brtson 'grus kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang brtson 'grus kyis yongs su sdud do //
translated: Those who are to be gathered by effort are gathered by effort.

original: gang ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs su sdud do //
analyzed: gang ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs su sdud do //
translated: Those who are to be gathered by meditative stabilization are gathered by meditative stabilization.

original: gang shes rab kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang shes rab kyis yongs su sdud do; ;gang nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do //
analyzed: gang shes rab kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang shes rab kyis yongs su sdud do; ;gang nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do //
translated: Those who are to be gathered by wisdom are gathered by wisdom. Those who are to be gathered by inner emptiness are gathered by inner emptiness.

original: gang phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do //
analyzed: gang phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do //
translated: Those who are to be gathered by outer emptiness are gathered by outer emptiness.

original: gang phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do //
analyzed: gang phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do //
translated: Those who are to be gathered by inner and outer emptiness are gathered by inner and outer emptiness.

original: gang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do //
analyzed: gang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do //
translated: Those who are included in the emptiness of emptiness are also included in the emptiness of emptiness.

original: gang chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do //
analyzed: gang chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do //
translated: Those who are included in the emptiness of the great are also included in the emptiness of the great.

original: gang don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do //
analyzed: gang don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do //
translated: Those who are included in the emptiness of the ultimate are also included in the emptiness of the ultimate.

original: gang 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do //
analyzed: gang 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do //
translated: Those who are included in the emptiness of the conditioned are also included in the emptiness of the conditioned.

original: gang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do //🔽gang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba @486a *//
analyzed: gang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do //🔽gang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba @486a *//
translated: Those who are included in the emptiness of the unconditioned are also included in the emptiness of the unconditioned.🔽Those who are included in the emptiness of what is beyond extremes are also included in the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.

original: de dag kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do //🔽gang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do //
analyzed: de dag kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do // gang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do //
translated: They are also included in the emptiness of the transcendence of suffering.🔽They are also included in the emptiness of the beginningless and endless.

original: gang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do //
analyzed: gang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do //
translated: They are also included in the emptiness of non-rejection.

original: gang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do //
analyzed: gang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do //
translated: They are also included in the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: gang chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do //
analyzed: gang chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do //
translated: They are also included in the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: gang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do //
analyzed: gang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do //
translated: Those that are included by the emptiness of defining characteristics are also included by the emptiness of defining characteristics.

original: gang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do //
analyzed: gang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do //
translated: Those that are included by the emptiness of non-apprehension are also included by the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: gang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do //
analyzed: gang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do //
translated: Those that are included by the emptiness of non-things are also included by the emptiness of non-things.

original: gang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do //
analyzed: gang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do //
translated: Those that are included by the emptiness of own-being are also included by the emptiness of own-being.

original: gang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do //
analyzed: gang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do //
translated: Those that are included by the emptiness of the own-being of non-things are also included by the emptiness of the own-being of non-things.

original: gang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis yongs su @486b bsdu ba de dag kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis yongs su sdud do //
analyzed: gang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis yongs su @486b bsdu ba de dag kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis yongs su sdud do //
translated: Those who are gathered by the applications of mindfulness are gathered by the applications of mindfulness.

original: gang yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongs su sdud do; ;gang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis yongs su sdud
analyzed: gang yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongs su sdud do; ;gang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis yongs su sdud
translated: Those who are gathered by the right efforts are gathered by the right efforts. Those who are gathered by the bases of supernatural power are gathered by the bases of supernatural power.

original: do // gang dbang po rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang dbang po rnams kyis yongs su sdud do //
analyzed: do // gang dbang po rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang dbang po rnams kyis yongs su sdud do //
translated: Those who are gathered by the faculties are gathered by the faculties.

original: gang stobs rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang stobs rnams kyis yongs su sdud do //
analyzed: gang stobs rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang stobs rnams kyis yongs su sdud do //
translated: Those who are gathered by the powers are gathered by the powers.

original: gang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongs su sdud do //
analyzed: gang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongs su sdud do //
translated: Those who are gathered by the limbs of awakening are gathered by the limbs of awakening.

original: gang lam gyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang lam gyis yongs su sdud do //
analyzed: gang lam gyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang lam gyis yongs su sdud do //
translated: Those who are gathered by the path are gathered by the path.

original: gang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis yongs su sdud do //
analyzed: gang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis yongs su sdud do //
translated: Those who are gathered by the noble truths are gathered by the noble truths.

original: gang bsam gtan rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang bsam gtan rnams kyis yongs su sdud do; ;gang tshad med pa rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang tshad med pa rnams kyis yongs su sdud do //
analyzed: gang bsam gtan rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang bsam gtan rnams kyis yongs su sdud do; ;gang tshad med pa rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang tshad med pa rnams kyis yongs su sdud do //
translated: Those who are gathered by the concentrations are gathered by the concentrations. Those who are gathered by the immeasurables are gathered by the immeasurables.

original: gang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongs su sdud do //
analyzed: gang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongs su sdud do //
translated: Those who are gathered by the formless absorptions are gathered by the formless absorptions.

original: gang rnams par thar pa rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang rnam par thar pa rnams kyis yongs @487a *//🔽su sdud do //
analyzed: gang rnams par thar pa rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang rnam par thar pa rnams kyis yongs @487a *//🔽su sdud do //
translated: Those who are gathered by the liberations are gathered by the liberations.🔽Those who are gathered by the aspects of emptiness are gathered by the aspects of emptiness.

original: gang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongs su sdud do //
analyzed: gang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongs su sdud do //
translated: Those who are gathered by the formless absorptions are gathered by the formless absorptions.

original: gang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas yongs su sdud do //
analyzed: gang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas yongs su sdud do //
translated: Those who are gathered by the emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness gateways to liberation are gathered by the emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness gateways to liberation.

original: gang mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongs su sdud do //
analyzed: gang mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongs su sdud do //
translated: Those who are gathered by the higher cognitions are gathered by the higher cognitions.

original: gang ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis yongs su sdud do //
analyzed: gang ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis yongs su sdud do //
translated: Those who are gathered by the meditative stabilizations are gathered by the meditative stabilizations.

original: gang gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongs su sdud do //
analyzed: gang gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongs su sdud do //
translated: Those who are gathered by the dhāraṇī gateways are gathered by the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyis yongs su sdud do //
analyzed: gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyis yongs su sdud do //
translated: Those who are gathered by the powers of the Tathāgata are gathered by the powers of the Tathāgata.

original: gang mi 'jigs pa rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang mi 'jigs pa rnams kyis yongs su sdud do //
analyzed: gang mi 'jigs pa rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang mi 'jigs pa rnams kyis yongs su sdud do //
translated: Those who are gathered by the fearlessnesses are gathered by the fearlessnesses.

original: gang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis yongs su sdud do //🔽gang byams pa chen pos yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang byams pa chen pos yongs su sdud do //
analyzed: gang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis yongs su sdud do // gang byams pa chen pos yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang byams pa chen pos yongs su sdud do //
translated: Those who are gathered by the detailed and thorough knowledges are gathered by the detailed and thorough knowledges.🔽Those who are gathered by the great love are gathered by the great love.

original: gang snying rje chen pos yongs su @487b bsdu ba de dag kyang snying rje chen pos yongs su sdud do //
analyzed: gang snying rje chen pos yongs su @487b bsdu ba de dag kyang snying rje chen pos yongs su sdud do //
translated: Those who are gathered by the great compassion are gathered by the great compassion.

original: gang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis yongs su sdud do //
analyzed: gang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis yongs su sdud do //
translated: Those who are gathered by the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are gathered by the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: gang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bus yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bus yongs su sdud do //
analyzed: gang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bus yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bus yongs su sdud do //
translated: Those who are to be guided by the result of stream enterer are guided by the result of stream enterer.

original: gang lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus yongs su sdud do //
analyzed: gang lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus yongs su sdud do //
translated: Those who are to be guided by the result of once-returner are guided by the result of once-returner.

original: gang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus yongs su sdud do //
analyzed: gang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus yongs su sdud do //
translated: Those who are to be guided by the result of non-returner are guided by the result of non-returner.

original: gang dgra bcom pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang dgra bcom pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do //
analyzed: gang dgra bcom pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang dgra bcom pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do //
translated: Those who are to be guided by the state of a worthy one are guided by the state of a worthy one.

original: gang rang byang chub kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang rang byang chub kyis yongs su sdud do //
analyzed: gang rang byang chub kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang rang byang chub kyis yongs su sdud do //
translated: Those who are to be guided by a pratyekabuddha’s awakening are guided by a pratyekabuddha’s awakening.

original: gang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do //
analyzed: gang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do //
translated: Those who are to be guided by the knowledge of path aspects are guided by the knowledge of path aspects.

original: gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do //
analyzed: gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do //
translated: Those who are gathered by the knowledge of all aspects are gathered by the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ltar gang dang gang dge ba'i chos gang dang gang gis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang dge ba'i chos de dang de dag gis yongs su sdud do //🔽de dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang ldan zhing chos thams cad la dbang sgyur bas 'khor ba nye bar len kyang 'khor @488a *//
analyzed: de ltar gang dang gang dge ba'i chos gang dang gang gis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang dge ba'i chos de dang de dag gis yongs su sdud do // de dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang ldan zhing chos thams cad la dbang sgyur bas 'khor ba nye bar len kyang 'khor @488a *//
translated: In this way, those who are gathered by any wholesome dharmas are gathered by those very wholesome dharmas.

original: ba'i sdug bsngal gyis mi gos te /
analyzed: ba'i sdug bsngal gyis mi gos te /
translated: Endowed with those wholesome roots, and having mastered all dharmas, they appropriate saṃsāra, but are not defiled by the suffering of saṃsāra.

original: de sems can rnams kyi don du mi dang lha'i phun sum tshogs pa nye bar len te /
analyzed: de sems can rnams kyi don du mi dang lha'i phun sum tshogs pa nye bar len te /
translated: For the sake of sentient beings, they appropriate the excellence of humans and gods.

original: phun sum tshogs pa de dag gis sems can rnams yongs su sdud do //
analyzed: phun sum tshogs pa de dag gis sems can rnams yongs su sdud do //
translated: Through that excellence, they gather in sentient beings.

original: de chos thams cad mtshan nyid med par shes pas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu shes kyang de la mi gnas so //
analyzed: de chos thams cad mtshan nyid med par shes pas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu shes kyang de la mi gnas so //
translated: Through knowing that all dharmas are without defining characteristics, they know the fruit of stream-enterer, but they do not rest in that.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes kyang de la mi gnas so //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes kyang de la mi gnas so //
translated: He knows the fruit of once-returner, but does not stand in it.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes kyang de la mi gnas so /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes kyang de la mi gnas so /
translated: He knows the fruit of non-returner, but does not stand in it.

original: dgra bcom pa nyid shes kyang de la mi gnas so //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid shes kyang de la mi gnas so //
translated: He knows the state of a worthy one, but does not stand in it.

original: rang byang chub shes kyang de la mi gnas so //
analyzed: rang byang chub shes kyang de la mi gnas so //
translated: He knows a pratyekabuddha’s awakening, but does not stand in it.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: de ni / 'di ltar des chos thams cad shes par bya ste /
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar des chos thams cad shes par bya ste /
translated: Because he should know all dharmas,

original: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir te /
translated: and should attain the knowledge of all aspects that is not shared in common with all śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos thams cad mtshan nyid med par shes pas /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos thams cad mtshan nyid med par shes pas /
translated: Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings knowing all dharmas to be without a defining mark

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan nyid med par shes so //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan nyid med par shes so //
translated: know the perfection of giving to be without a defining mark.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan nyid med par shes so //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan nyid med par shes so //
translated: They know the perfection of morality to be without a defining mark.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan nyid med par shes so //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan nyid med par shes so //
translated: they know the perfection of patience to be without marks;

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan nyid med par shes so //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan nyid med par shes so //
translated: they know the perfection of perseverance to be without marks;

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan nyid med par shes so //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan nyid med par shes so //
translated: they know the perfection of concentration to be without marks;

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan @488b nyid med par shes so //🔽nang stong pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan @488b nyid med par shes so // nang stong pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so //
translated: they know the perfection of wisdom to be without marks;🔽they know inner emptiness to be without marks;

original: phyi stong pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so //🔽phyi nang stong pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so // phyi nang stong pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so //
translated: they know outer emptiness to be without marks;🔽they know inner and outer emptiness to be without marks;

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so /🔽chen po stong pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so / chen po stong pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so //
translated: they know the emptiness of emptiness to be without marks;🔽they know great emptiness to be without marks;

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so //🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so // 'dus byas stong pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so //
translated: they know ultimate emptiness to be without marks;🔽they know conditioned emptiness to be without marks;

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so //
translated: they know unconditioned emptiness to be without marks;

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so //🔽thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so // thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so //
translated: He knows the emptiness of the unlimited as signless.🔽He knows the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end as signless.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so //
translated: He knows the emptiness of non-rejection as signless.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so //
translated: He knows the emptiness of inherent existence as signless.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so //🔽rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so //🔽mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so // rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so // mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so //
translated: He knows the emptiness of all things as signless.🔽He knows the emptiness of inherent characteristics as signless.🔽He knows the emptiness of non-apprehension as signless.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so //🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so //
translated: He knows the emptiness of non-entities as signless.🔽He knows the emptiness of essential nature as signless.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so //
translated: He knows the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities as signless.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so /
translated: He knows the applications of mindfulness as signless.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so //
translated: they know that the right efforts have no mark;🔽they know that the bases of spiritual power have no mark;🔽they know that the faculties have no mark;🔽they know that the powers have no mark;🔽they know that the limbs of awakening have no mark;🔽they know that the noble eightfold path has no mark;🔽they know that the noble truths have no mark;🔽they know that the meditative stabilizations have no mark;🔽they know that the immeasurable aspirations have no mark;🔽they know that the formless absorptions have no mark;

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so //🔽dbang po rnams mtshan nyid @489a *//
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so // dbang po rnams mtshan nyid @489a *//
translated: they know that the deliverances have no mark;🔽they know that the totalities have no mark;🔽they know that the bases of mastery have no mark;🔽they know that the aspects of the liberations have no mark;🔽they know that the emptiness meditative stabilization has no mark;

original: med par shes so //🔽stobs rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so //
analyzed: med par shes so // stobs rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so //
translated: they know that the signless meditative stabilization has no mark;🔽they know that the wishless meditative stabilization has no mark;🔽they know that the perfection of giving has no mark;🔽they know that the perfection of morality has no mark;🔽they know that the perfection of patience has no mark;🔽they know that the perfection of perseverance has no mark;🔽they know that the perfection of concentration has no mark;🔽they know that the perfection of wisdom has no mark;🔽they know that the applications of mindfulness have no mark;🔽they know that the right efforts have no mark;🔽they know that the bases of spiritual power have no mark;🔽they know that the faculties have no mark;🔽they know that the powers have no mark;

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so //
translated: they know that the limbs of awakening have no mark;

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mtshan nyid med par shes so //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mtshan nyid med par shes so //
translated: they know that the noble eightfold path has no mark;

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so //
translated: they know that the noble truths have no mark;

original: bsam gtan rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so //
translated: they know that the meditative stabilizations have no mark;

original: tshad med pa rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so //
translated: they know that the immeasurable aspirations have no mark;

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so //
translated: they know that the formless absorptions have no mark;🔽they know that the deliverances have no mark;🔽they know that the totalities have no mark;🔽they know that the bases of mastery have no mark;🔽they know that the aspects of the liberations have no mark;🔽they know that the emptiness meditative stabilization has no mark;🔽they know that the signless meditative stabilization has no mark;

original: rnam par thar pa rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so; ;mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so; ;mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so //
translated: they know that the wishless meditative stabilization has no mark;🔽they know that the perfection of giving has no mark;🔽they know that the perfection of morality has no mark

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mtshan nyid med par shes so //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mtshan nyid med par shes so //
translated: He knows that the emptiness gate of liberation, the signless gate of liberation, and the wishless gate of liberation are without defining characteristics.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so //
translated: He knows that the superknowledges are without defining characteristics.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so //
translated: He knows that the meditative stabilizations are without defining characteristics.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so //
translated: He knows that the dhāraṇī gateways are without defining characteristics.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so //
translated: He knows that the powers of the tathāgatas are without defining characteristics.

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so //
translated: He knows that the fearlessnesses are without defining characteristics.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so //🔽byams pa chen po mtshan nyid med par shes so //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so // byams pa chen po mtshan nyid med par shes so //
translated: He knows that the detailed and thorough knowledges are without defining characteristics.🔽He knows that great love is without defining characteristics.

original: snying rje chen po mtshan nyid med par shes so //
analyzed: snying rje chen po mtshan nyid med par shes so //
translated: He knows that great compassion is without defining characteristics.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres @489b pa rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres @489b pa rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so //
translated: He knows that the distinct attributes of a buddha are without defining characteristics.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mtshan nyid med par shes so //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mtshan nyid med par shes so //
translated: He knows that the result of stream enterer is without defining characteristics.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mtshan nyid med par shes so //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mtshan nyid med par shes so //
translated: they know that the result of once-returner has no mark;

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mtshan nyid med par shes so //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mtshan nyid med par shes so //
translated: they know that the result of non-returner has no mark;

original: dgra bcom pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so //
translated: they know that the state of a worthy one has no mark;

original: rang byang chub mtshan nyid med par shes so //
analyzed: rang byang chub mtshan nyid med par shes so //
translated: they know that a pratyekabuddha’s awakening has no mark;

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so //
translated: they know that the knowledge of path aspects has no mark;

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so //
translated: and they know that the knowledge of all aspects has no mark.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rmi lam lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas /sgyu ma lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rmi lam lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas /sgyu ma lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom stand in the five appropriating aggregates that are like a dream, stand in the five appropriating aggregates that are like an illusion,

original: smig rgyu lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas; chu zla lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas /
analyzed: smig rgyu lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas; chu zla lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas /
translated: stand in the five appropriating aggregates that are like a mirage, stand in the five appropriating aggregates that are like an echo,🔽stand in the five appropriating aggregates that are like a reflected image,🔽stand in the five appropriating aggregates that are like an apparition, and stand in the five appropriating aggregates that are like a magical creation.

original: mig yor lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas /
analyzed: mig yor lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas /
translated: He dwells in the five appropriating aggregates which are like a mirage.🔽He dwells in the five appropriating aggregates which are like an echo.

original: sgra brnyan lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas gzugs brnyan lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas /
analyzed: sgra brnyan lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas gzugs brnyan lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas /
translated: He dwells in the five appropriating aggregates which are like a reflected image.

original: dri za'i grong khyer lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas /
analyzed: dri za'i grong khyer lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas /
translated: He dwells in the five appropriating aggregates which are like a city of gandharvas.🔽He dwells in the five appropriating aggregates which are like an apparition.

original: sprul pa lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas shing tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: sprul pa lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas shing tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: And he perfects the perfection of morality.

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'ang nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga rmi lam @490a *//🔽lta bur shes /🔽nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga sgyu ma lta bur shes /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'ang nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga rmi lam @490a *// lta bur shes / nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga sgyu ma lta bur shes /
translated: Subhūti, that bodhisattva great being knows the five appropriating aggregates to be like a dream,🔽knows the five appropriating aggregates to be like an illusion,🔽knows the five appropriating aggregates to be like a mirage,

original: nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga smig rgyu lta bur shes /
analyzed: nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga smig rgyu lta bur shes /
translated: knows the five appropriating aggregates to be like an echo,

original: nye bar len pa'i phur po lnga chu zla lta bur shes; nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga mig yor lta bur shes /
analyzed: nye bar len pa'i phur po lnga chu zla lta bur shes; nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga mig yor lta bur shes /
translated: They know the five appropriated aggregates to be like a mirage.

original: nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga sgra brnyan lta bur shes /
analyzed: nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga sgra brnyan lta bur shes /
translated: They know the five appropriated aggregates to be like an echo.

original: nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga gzugs brnyan lta bur shes /
analyzed: nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga gzugs brnyan lta bur shes /
translated: They know the five appropriated aggregates to be like a reflection.

original: nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga dri za'i grong khyer lta bur shes /
analyzed: nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga dri za'i grong khyer lta bur shes /
translated: They know the five appropriated aggregates to be like a city of gandharvas.🔽They know the five appropriated aggregates to be like an emanation.

original: nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga sprul pa lta bur shes nas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan nyid med pa /
analyzed: nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga sprul pa lta bur shes nas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan nyid med pa /
translated: They perfect the perfection of discipline, which is without characteristics,

original: ma zhig pa /🔽ma ral ba /🔽skyon med pa /
analyzed: ma zhig pa / ma ral ba / skyon med pa /
translated: is not destroyed,🔽is not torn,🔽is faultless,

original: rnyog pa med pa /
analyzed: rnyog pa med pa /
translated: is unpolluted,

original: nyams pa med pa /
analyzed: nyams pa med pa /
translated: is not diminished,

original: dbang du gyur pa /
analyzed: dbang du gyur pa /
translated: is mastered,

original: mkhas pas bsngags pa /
analyzed: mkhas pas bsngags pa /
translated: is praised by the wise,

original: shin tu rdzogs pa /
analyzed: shin tu rdzogs pa /
translated: is completely perfected,

original: 'phags par gyur pa /
analyzed: 'phags par gyur pa /
translated: is noble,

original: zag pa med pa /
analyzed: zag pa med pa /
translated: is uncontaminated,

original: lam gyi khongs su chud pa /
analyzed: lam gyi khongs su chud pa /
translated: is included within the path,

original: 'jig rten las 'das pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de /
analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de /
translated: and is beyond the world.
